dialogues.text: Not always Guy. It just sticks in my throat how a little punk like that can end up with everything. I must have busted him and his cronies a dozen times. Never could get anything to stick. Bastard was always to smart for us.

dialogues.speaker: GARDNER
dialogues.text: He's put a lot of money into Metropolis.

dialogues.speaker: HARPER
dialogues.text: Considering how much he's taken out of it it's only right. You want to know how he came by all that cash?

dialogues.speaker: GARDNER
dialogues.text: Sure I could use a few pointers.  58.

dialogues.speaker: HARPER
dialogues.text: When he was just some brat on the street him and his punks ran a protection racket down in the Bay. Bed good folks dry. He takes that cash and uses it to make a computer program then sells it to big firm out west for a billion. Gardner WHISTLES at the number.

dialogues.speaker: HARPER, (CON'T)
dialogues.text: It gets better. He then uses that cash and makes a better program makes the one he made first look like a calculator. Turns that billion into billions.

dialogues.speaker: GARDNER
dialogues.text: Sounds like good business.

dialogues.speaker: HARPER
dialogues.text: That's not the point. Point is he got his start by taking out of the pockets of decent people. Guys a crook and the whole damn world loves him.

dialogues.speaker: GARDNER
dialogues.text: He's rebuilding th city after those aliens blasted it.

dialogues.speaker: HARPER
dialogues.text: He's still a crook. Just a rich crook.

dialogues.speaker: GARDNER
dialogues.text: I'll take him over Superman any day. Better the devil you know Jim.

dialogues.speaker: HARPER
dialogues.text: You been watching the box? He's been doing a lot of good out there in the world.

dialogues.speaker: GARDER
dialogues.text: That'd be fine by me if he stayed away from Metropolis. I don't like that space man flying around here. Aliens weirds me out. A BLACK LIMO pulls up outside the LexCorp buildings MAIN ENTRANCE.

dialogues.speaker: GARDER, (CON'T)
dialogues.text: Who's this now? Alfred steps out of the Limo and opens the Limo passenger door and Bruce Wayne emerges dressed in a EXPENSIVE SUIT.  59.

dialogues.speaker: HARPER
dialogues.text: (surprised) That's Bruce Wayne.

dialogues.speaker: GARDER
dialogues.text: unimpressed who? 07 Alfred gets back into the Limo while Wayne walks enters LexCorp tower.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wayne walks through the Lobby and stops when he notices there is a BASKETBALL COURT located to his right. HIP YOU TECHNICIANS and COMPUTER PROGRAMMERS WALK back and forth. Mercy awaits the Billionaire Gothamite. She has a SCARF around her neck to CONCEAL her BRUISES. She reaches out her hand to Wayne.

dialogues.speaker: MERCY
dialogues.text: (perky) . Mercy Graves. Assistant to Mr. Luthor. It's a pleasure. Wayne takes her hand and cracks a smile.

dialogues.speaker: WAYNE
dialogues.text: The pleasure is all mine. (points to the court) Nice decor.

dialogues.speaker: MERCY
dialogues.text: (smiles) A perk for the minions. Lex believes a entertained workforce is a productive workforce.

dialogues.speaker: WAYNE
dialogues.text: Nice policy.

dialogues.speaker: MERCY
dialogues.text: Effective policy. She leads Wayne towards the GLASS ELEVATOR BANKS. They st inside and Mercy presses the TOP FLOOR. The Elevator lifts off. As the lift climbs Wayne observes each floor. Many of the Floors are filled with ROWS and ROWS of COMPU MONITORS each manned by a YOUTHFUL TECH GENIUS.

dialogues.speaker: WAYNE
dialogues.text: I remember when LexCorp was a warehouse by the Bay.  60.

dialogues.speaker: MERCY
dialogues.text: Lex's goal has always been meeting ones potential. He believes LexCorp is an example to which everyone can strive to. The Elevator comes to a halt and the doors slide open and Wayne steps into the SPACIOUS 125th floor PENTHOUSE. The ROOM is HUGE and ROUND bordered BY WINDOWS which offe PANORAMIC view of Metropolis. A BALCONY jutts out of the side of the Penthouse. Wayne steps inside and the doors close behind him. Sitting CROSS LEGGED on his desk in front of an ARRAY of COMPUTER SCREENS is the RICHEST man on the PLANET, ALEXAN "LEX' LUTHOR, 30, the C.E.0 of LexCorp. He is one part TE GENIUS, one part RUTHLESS business man and two parts METROPOLIS STREET TOUGH. His SHAGGY MANE of HAIR hangs be his eyes and a detailed SLEEVE TATTOO of the METROPOLIS SKYLINE creeps up his right arm. His EYES say it all. Behind them BURN the FIRES of UNPARALLELLED GENIUS. A POWERFUL INTELLECT enabling him t accomplish anything he bends his will toward. Within the boundaries of his mind he is GODLIKE. Wayne observes the IMAGES that captivate the youthful billionaire... THE MAN OF STEEL.

dialogues.speaker: LUTHOR
dialogues.text: Look at it. So sleek. So powerful.

dialogues.speaker: WAYNE
dialogues.text: He's an impressive specimen.

dialogues.speaker: LUTHOR
dialogues.text: 'It' Wayne (shifts around to face him) It's an alien. And a trespasser and it doesn't belong on this planet. Perhaps you share my view?

dialogues.speaker: WAYNE
dialogues.text: Superman isn't the reason for my being in Metropolis.

dialogues.speaker: LUTHOR
dialogues.text: Your reason being Metropolis itself.

dialogues.speaker: WAYNE
dialogues.text: I can't help but take an interest in the city's tragic circumstances.  61.

dialogues.speaker: LUTHOR
dialogues.text: (half smiles) And profitable circumstances.

dialogues.speaker: WAYNE
dialogues.text: Neither of us would have gotten to where we are if we didn't look at the bottom line.

dialogues.speaker: LUTHOR
dialogues.text: I got to where I am through hard work and innovation. You by accident of birth. I assure you we view our bottom lines very differently. He HOPS of his desk and walks past Wayne to a BAR near th ELEVATOR. In comparison Luthor is much SMALLER that the POWERFULLY BUILT Gothamite. Yet his CONFIDENCE more than matches Wayne's stature. Luthor reaches into the FRIDGE and removes and ENERGY DRI

dialogues.speaker: LUTHOR, (CON'T)
dialogues.text: (cracks open the can) I'd offer you a drink but I don't have any gingerale.

dialogues.speaker: WAYNE
dialogues.text: We both want the same thing Lex. To help Metropolis. Our past differences shouldn't get in the way of that.

dialogues.speaker: LUTHOR
dialogues.text: (takes a gulp) Past differences? As I recall you called me an amoral, arrogant brat.

dialogues.speaker: WAYNE
dialogues.text: Yes on the very same day you launched your first satellite. Luthor smiles.

dialogues.speaker: WAYNE, (CON'T)
dialogues.text: And a cyber attack crippled mine.

dialogues.speaker: LUTHOR
dialogues.text: (smirks and leans back against the Bar) Coincidence Wayne. The world is full of it.

dialogues.speaker: WAYNE
dialogues.text: Apparently so. Took us quite a while to get it operational again.  62.

dialogues.speaker: LUTHOR
dialogues.text: I liked that satellite. It was quaint. Whatever happened to it?

dialogues.speaker: WAYNE
dialogues.text: An alien in a black onesie kicked it out of the sky.

dialogues.speaker: LUTHOR
dialogues.text: (amused) Ouch.

dialogues.speaker: WAYNE
dialogues.text: I'm here to help. The rebuilding of Metropolis is my main priority. Pooling our resources would better serve it's citizens. I'm willing to let bygones be bygones. If you are?

dialogues.speaker: LUTHOR
dialogues.text: An alien spacecraft blasted a hole in the city where I was born. I'm not about to let a few limp insults from a trust fund baby overshadow that. (finishes his drink and crushes the can) Do you really think you would have gotten past the lobby if I was holding a grudge.

dialogues.speaker: WAYNE
dialogues.text: I'm glad we can put it aside. I don't think either of us relishes continuing this war for contracts.

dialogues.speaker: LUTHOR
dialogues.text: (dismissive) Wayne enterprises is a powerful company but not enough to challenge me in my own backyard. I am LexCorp. LexCorp is Metropolis. Those contracts are mine. But despite your company's limitations there are things I can use it for. It'll allow me to focus on more important matters. Wayne looks back at the monitors.

dialogues.speaker: WAYNE
dialogues.text: Superman?

dialogues.speaker: LUTHOR
dialogues.text: (irritated) It's not a man. It's an alien. And by the time the world finally absorbs that this... (MORE )

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: LUTHOR (cont'd) (gestures out of the window towards the ruined sections of Metropolis) . could happen again. Wayne look out on the RUINED and IN REPAIR structures. Hi face reflects his CONCERN for the City.

dialogues.speaker: WAYNE
dialogues.text: What would you suggest?

dialogues.speaker: LUTHOR
dialogues.text: When a dog bites a man we put it down. Because we understand what it's capable of. That thing isn't one of us and doesn't deserve the understanding that the government is affording it.

dialogues.speaker: WAYNE
dialogues.text: You sound like you want to kill him?

dialogues.speaker: LUTHOR
dialogues.text: There comes a time when even a god must die.

dialogues.speaker: WAYNE
dialogues.text: You've seen what he... 'It' can do. All that power. All that strength.

dialogues.speaker: LUTHOR
dialogues.text: It might be hard for someone like you born with the silveriest of spoons to understand. I spent my childhood on the streets. I joined a gang. It's survival. I didn't have much of a choice. I learned there that there was always someone bigger, stronger but never smarter. By the time I was 15 that gang answered to me. Strength is nothing Wayne. Resolve is everything.

dialogues.speaker: WAYNE
dialogues.text: Then why not use that resolve to find a peaceful solution.

dialogues.speaker: LUTHOR
dialogues.text: There is no peaceful solution with an trespasser.

dialogues.speaker: WAYNE
dialogues.text: How about one that doesn't involve you going toe to toe with a god.  64.

dialogues.speaker: LUTHOR
dialogues.text: (amused) Toe to toe? I don't go toe to toe with anybody. You don't become the general by charging the frontlines with the rest of the troops.

dialogues.speaker: WAYNE
dialogues.text: Too smart for that? Luthor raises and eyebrow and smiles.

dialogues.speaker: WAYNE
dialogues.text: I'm glad you reconsidered and alliance.

dialogues.speaker: LUTHOR
dialogues.text: I'm not usually one to second guess myself but you don't become a billionaire at 18 by ignoring the bigger picture. (walks past Wayne and returns to his position on the desk) I'll have Mercy send some contracts over. I'm sure we can find something for you to do. However minimal.

dialogues.speaker: WAYNE
dialogues.text: I look forward to it. I'll be at my Metropolis offices. Luthor doesn't reply. He just stares at the Computer screens and the BLUE and RED clad source of his VENDETTA. Wayne turns and walks toward the Elevator.

dialogues.speaker: LUTHOR
dialogues.text: 6'2". 225lbs Wayne steps into the Elevator.

dialogues.speaker: WAYNE
dialogues.text: You got me exactly.

dialogues.speaker: LUTHOR
dialogues.text: (smiles) I was talking about the Batman. Wayne pauses as the Elevator doors slide shut. Luthor smiles. Assured in his SUPERIORITY.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Superman, in his NEW SUIT now with FLOWING RED CAPE and H SYMBOL on it's chest, HOVERS SERENELY among the CLOUDS wi his eyes CLOSED as he LISTENS to the SOUNDS of the City.  65.

dialogues.speaker: VOICES, (0.S)
dialogues.text: (uncertain) I can't be certain... (polite) Two sugars please... (affectionate) You're beautiful...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Frightened PATRONS lie FACE DOWN on the floor of the Bank while TwO MASKED and ARMED BANK ROBBERS stand guard while THIRD proceeds to INTIMIDATE the BANK MANAGER by JAMMING GUN in his FACE.

dialogues.speaker: BANK ROBBER
dialogues.text: (hands two large rucksacks to Bank Manager ) Money in the bags. 50's and 100's (shouts) Now!

dialogues.speaker: BANK MANAGER
dialogues.text: (calmly) Ok. Just stay calm. We'll do anything you want. The Bank Manager hands the rucksacks to a YOUNG FEMALE BA TELLER who proceeds to comply with the Bank Robber's demands.

dialogues.speaker: BANK ROBBER
dialogues.text: (to Bank Robber#3) Hurry it up!

dialogues.speaker: BANK ROBBER
dialogues.text: (turns his head away from the Manager) I'm on it! With the Bank Robber momentarily DISTRACTED the Bank Tell presses the SILENT ALARM.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Harper is at the wheel PEELING an ORANGE. Gardner is SIPP a Coffee when a CALL comes over the Radio.

dialogues.speaker: RADIO
dialogues.text: All cars. All Cars. We have a 2113 at the First national Bank on Smith and Byrne. Gardner SNATCHES the SPEAKER.

dialogues.speaker: GARDNER
dialogues.text: (into speaker) This is Car 59. We are en route.  66. Harper puts the orange down STARTS the engine.

dialogues.speaker: GARDNER, (CON'T)
dialogues.text: (excited) Finally!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Bank Teller STUFFS the MONEY into the rucksacks while being held at GUNPOINT by Bank Robber#3

dialogues.speaker: BANK ROBBER
dialogues.text: (impatient ) Hurry it up! She moves FASTER.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Harper and Gardner Patrol car has arrived at the scene.

dialogues.speaker: GARDNER
dialogues.text: (smiling) We got them!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The GETAWAY CAR is parked across the STREET from the Bank The GETAWAY DRIVER sees the Patrol Car arriving and watch as Harper and Gardner jump out. A S.W.A.T Van pulls up behind them and and the S.W.A.T TEAM pours out of the Van and TAKES POSITION. He FRANTICALLY picks up his WALKIE TALKIE.

dialogues.speaker: GETAWAY DRIVER
dialogues.text: Shit! (frantic, into Walkie Talkie) Somebody hit the goddamn alarm!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bank Robber#1 listens to the Getaway Driver on his Walkie Talkie.

dialogues.speaker: BANK ROBBER
dialogues.text: _ (angry) Dammit! They hit the alarm! Bank Robber#3 out of FRUSTRAION turns and STRIKES the Ban Manager ACROSS the back of his head with his GUN. He then turns his attention to the TERRIFIED Bank Teller.

dialogues.speaker: BANK ROBBER
dialogues.text: Get up bitch!  67. She stands and he PUSHES her ROUGHLY towards the Patrons.

dialogues.speaker: BANK ROBBER
dialogues.text: (freaking out) What the hell are we going to do?

dialogues.speaker: BANK ROBBER
dialogues.text: Shut up! We're going out the front as planned. (gestures to the Patrons) Grab some cover. Bank Robber#1 GRABS a TEENAGE GIRL from the floor. Her BOYFRIEND gets up and RUSHES the Bank Robber.

dialogues.speaker: BOYFRIEND
dialogues.text: (yells) Get your hands off of her! The three Bank Robber's proceed to BEAT him DOWN. The Patrons SCREAM. Bank Robber#2 FIRES into the ceiling.

dialogues.speaker: BANK ROBBER
dialogues.text: (shouts) Shut up!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Superman's eyes SNAP OPEN and he ROCKETS toward the City.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bank Robber#3 GRABS Bank Robber#2's arm.

dialogues.speaker: BANK ROBBER
dialogues.text: Quit it you idiot!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gardner looks around IMPATIENTLY.

dialogues.speaker: GARDNER
dialogues.text: (impatient ) Why are we just standing here?

dialogues.speaker: HARPER
dialogues.text: It's called protocol Guy.

dialogues.speaker: GARDNER
dialogues.text: It's called sitting on our as... Gardner is CUT OFF as a RED and BLUE blur SPEEDS past and THROUGH the Bank Entrance.  68.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bank Robber#3 is SWEPT OFF his FEET and SLAMMED into the wall and to the floor. Bank Robber#2 DROPS to the floor and SCURRIES toward the exit. Bank Robber#1 finds himself FACE to FACE with the Man of Steel and OPENS FIRE but the PULVERIZED BULLETS BOUNCE HARMLESSLY off Superman's CHEST and he CRUSHES the GUN in ONE HAND.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bank Robber#2 CRAWLS out of the Bank and towards the Cops Superman HOVERS out of the Entrance holding the other Ban Robber's by the BACK of their JACKETS.

dialogues.speaker: HARPER
dialogues.text: (impressed) Would you look at that. Gardner SCOWLS. Superman LANDS and PLACES the Robber's on the ground.

dialogues.speaker: SUPERMAN
dialogues.text: They're all yours. Harper nods to Superman as he CUFFS and ARRESTS the Bank Robbers. The Patron's SLOWLY exit the Bank and look in AWE at thei SAVIOR. Harper's ORANGE hits Superman on the back of the head. He turns to see Gardner, looking PISSED.

dialogues.speaker: SUPERMAN
dialogues.text: (polite) Is there a problem officer?

dialogues.speaker: GARDNER
dialogues.text: (angry) Yeah. I don't see a badge. You can't just turn up and do our jobs when you feel like it.

dialogues.speaker: SUPERMAN
dialogues.text: Just trying to help. (Superman points across the street at the Getaway Car) You might want to question that man over there. I think he might have something to do with the robbery.  69. Gardner looks around see the Getaway Driver who's EYES BU OUT when he is discovered. The Getaway car FLEES the SCENE.

dialogues.speaker: GARDNER
dialogues.text: Goddammit ! Gardner and Harper JUMP into their Patrol Car and GIVE CHASE. Superman watches and smiles then takes off. The Cops, Bank Robbers and Patrons watch as he flies away

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Luthor sits on his desk and DOWNS an energy drink. He has been watching the Bank Robbery on his computer monitors. Mercy steps out of the Elevator.

dialogues.speaker: MERCY
dialogues.text: The contracts have been sent to Wayne Enterprises.

dialogues.speaker: LUTHOR
dialogues.text: That should make the trust fund baby happy.

dialogues.speaker: MERCY
dialogues.text: What about the break in at the research center?

dialogues.speaker: LUTHOR
dialogues.text: (uninterested) What about it?

dialogues.speaker: MERCY
dialogues.text: I think it deserves some attention. Luthor shifts around on his desk to face his assistant.

dialogues.speaker: LUTHOR
dialogues.text: It's of no concern. We have what we need and we're on schedule.

dialogues.speaker: MERCY
dialogues.text: There are security concerns at the complex. Very serious concerns. Somebody sold us out to the Themyscirians.

dialogues.speaker: LUTHOR
dialogues.text: (matter of fact) It was Morgan.  70.

dialogues.speaker: MERCY
dialogues.text: (shocked) You knew.

dialogues.speaker: LUTHOR
dialogues.text: Morgan has a mercenary nature. He saw an opportunity and exploited it.

dialogues.speaker: MERCY
dialogues.text: And what's to be done. He HOPS off his desk and walks over to the window and loo out over his CITY.

dialogues.speaker: LUTHOR
dialogues.text: We exploit an opportunity. Contact Cain. She nods.

dialogues.speaker: MERCY
dialogues.text: There is the matter of the conference. Have you reconsidered attending?

dialogues.speaker: LUTHOR
dialogues.text: Why waste my time. I already know how all of this will play out.

dialogues.speaker: MERCY
dialogues.text: I'll take care of the other matter. She leaves. Luthor returns to his seat and activates the Monitors whi display SEVERAL DIFFERENT ANGLES of a LARGE GATHERING of people.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: SEVERAL MILITARY HELICOPTERS fly over Metropolis's larges park, CENTENNIAL PARK. The Park has been CORDONED off to the PUBLIC. Over a THOUSAND Military personnel, ARMY and MARINES, guard the Park. In the Middle of the Park a STAGE and a PODIUM has been ERECTED. HUNDREDS of SEATS surround the PODIUM in ROWS. Around the seats is yet another PERIMETER guarded by MARINES. TANKS CIRCLE the Perimeter. FIGHTER JETS make SWEEPS over head.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The MAIN ENTRANCE is guarded by DOZENS of ARMED MARINES.  71. SEVERAL WORLD LEADERS and UNITED NATIONS OFFICIALS enter PARK. Behind railings HUNDREDS of REPORTERS and PAPARAZZI take PICTURES as the DIGNITARIES arrive. Bruce Wayne's Limo pulls up. He exits and enters the Park a CHORUS of: Mr Wayne! Mr Wayne! As the MEDIA spots him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lois, followed by Jimmy, walks towards an ENTRANCE to the Park which is GUARDED by TWO MARINES. Jimmy is FIDDLING with his CAMERA.

dialogues.speaker: LOIS
dialogues.text: (irritated) Get your ass in gear Olsen!

dialogues.speaker: JIMMY
dialogues.text: Sorry I was just getting so many good shots.

dialogues.speaker: LOIS
dialogues.text: I thought you wanted to see Superman?

dialogues.speaker: JIMMY
dialogues.text: He's here already?

dialogues.speaker: LOIS
dialogues.text: He's about to be. Lois walks toward the Entrance but is stopped by a MARINE Lois FLASHES her CREDENTIALS

dialogues.speaker: MARINE
dialogues.text: Centennial Park is off limits to press.

dialogues.speaker: LOIS
dialogues.text: I'm Lois Lane. As a liaison with Superman I have expressed permission to be here by the U.S government. The Marine turns to his FELLOW SOLDIER who gets on the ra to get confirmation on Lois' claims.

dialogues.speaker: MARINE
dialogues.text: She checks out let her through. She moves past the Marines. Jimmy follows.

dialogues.speaker: JIMMY
dialogues.text: (awkwardly) I'm with Superman too.  72.

dialogues.speaker: LOIS, (0.S)
dialogues.text: (irritated) Come on Olsen! He rushes past.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wayne walks through a SECURITY CHECK into a SECTIONED OFF AREA of the Park. He cordially smiles as the ASSORTED WOR LEADERS present.

dialogues.speaker: MAN, (0.S)
dialogues.text: (booming) Bruce Wayne! Bruce turns to se GENERAL CANDY, the HIGHEST RANKING U.S ARMY FIGURE present. He stands with Swanwick, Silas and Stewart.

dialogues.speaker: WAYNE
dialogues.text: General.

dialogues.speaker: CANDY
dialogues.text: You've met General Swanwick and Professor Stone before right?.

dialogues.speaker: SWANWICK
dialogues.text: Mr. Wayne. He and Wayne shake hands.

dialogues.speaker: SILAS
dialogues.text: Mr. Wayne Good to see you again.

dialogues.speaker: WAYNE
dialogues.text: Professor. They shake hands. Candy SLAPS Stewart on the shoulder.

dialogues.speaker: CANDY
dialogues.text: And this is John Stewart. The toughest S.0.B to ever come out of the Corps. Used to be my right hand man before he went to work for the eggheads.

dialogues.speaker: STEWART
dialogues.text: (to Wayne) Sir.

dialogues.speaker: CANDY
dialogues.text: So what's your interest in Big Blue Wayne?  73.

dialogues.speaker: WAYNE
dialogues.text: The same as everyone else. I want to hear what he has to say.

dialogues.speaker: CANDY
dialogues.text: (dismissive) Unless it's the oath of allegiance I'm not interested.

dialogues.speaker: WAYNE
dialogues.text: I think there's more at stake here than patriotism General. This is to determine if the Superman is an ally to the world not just American interests.

dialogues.speaker: CANDY
dialogues.text: Look around you Wayne. Everybody here wants to know who the Alien calls boss. Let's just hope its Uncle Sam.

dialogues.speaker: STEWART
dialogues.text: Well it's certainly not Mother Russia.

dialogues.speaker: CANDY
dialogues.text: (laughs) I have to give it to him, he knows how to piss the commies off.

dialogues.speaker: STEWART
dialogues.text: Looking at the faces here it seems he knows how to piss the whole planet off.

dialogues.speaker: WAYNE
dialogues.text: (to Stewart) And whats your take?

dialogues.speaker: STEWART
dialogues.text: Same as you. I'm going to wait and see.

dialogues.speaker: CANDY
dialogues.text: (laughs) John here has mellowed out some but trust me if Big Blue starts any more trouble this here's the last guy he'd want to mess with.

dialogues.speaker: WAYNE
dialogues.text: Good to know.

dialogues.speaker: CANDY
dialogues.text: Mr. Wayne here isn't a fan of us Military types. His company won't build us any fancy gadgets.  74.

dialogues.speaker: WAYNE
dialogues.text: My company doesn't build weapons. I don't see war as good business.

dialogues.speaker: CANDY
dialogues.text: Well lucky for us and our boys on the front LexCorp does. Amanda Waller walks past flanked by TWO ARMED BODYGUARDS.

dialogues.speaker: WAYNE
dialogues.text: Who's that?

dialogues.speaker: SWANWICK
dialogues.text: Amanda Waller.

dialogues.speaker: CANDY
dialogues.text: She used to be the Warden of Belle Reve before she became Senator. She's a mean piece of work. They don't call her the 'wall' for nothing. The GATHERING STARTS to CONVERGE towards the ASSEMBLY ARE

dialogues.speaker: STEWART
dialogues.text: Looks like this party's about to start. Wayne and the others follow the crowd as they flow toward the Assembly Area.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The WORLD LEADERS and the assorted MILITARY OFFICIALS hav taken their seats. The SECRETARY GENERAL OF THE UNITED NATIONS take the Podi

dialogues.speaker: SECRETARY GENERAL
dialogues.text: This is a solemn occasion. A year ago today this city and our entire Civilization experienced an event unprecedented in our collective histories. Our world changed. We are now at a precipice. A turning point that will determine the future of our planet. And we'd these words I give you (gestures towards the sky) Kal El. A HUSH goes over the CROWD. Superman FLOATS above them an lands on the stage. MARINES raise their WEAPONS and the TANKS train their CANNONS on the Kryptonian.  75. Superman takes the Podium and looks out over the Assembly Lois watches him with CONCERN. Jimmy SNAPS pictures.

dialogues.speaker: SUPERMAN
dialogues.text: (takes a breath) My name is Kal El. I stand in front of you today as a gesture of peace. I know that my presence here has changed how the human race perceives itself. As a child I was sent here from my world Krypton but Earth has always been my home. It is where I was raised. Everything I know, everything I am comes from here. I am one of you. A DIPLOMAT yells from the audience. President

dialogues.speaker: DIPLOMAT, (O.S)
dialogues.text: (shouts) You are not one of us!

dialogues.speaker: SUPERMAN
dialogues.text: I understand your fears. But I am not your enemy. Nelson stands up.

dialogues.speaker: PRESIDENT NELSON
dialogues.text: And what are our assurances?

dialogues.speaker: SUPERMAN
dialogues.text: All I can give you is my word.

dialogues.speaker: PRESIDENT NELSON
dialogues.text: That just isn't enough. If we are to trust you then we must know you.

dialogues.speaker: SUPERMAN
dialogues.text: I believe all the world needs to know is that I am here to help. To protect. I offer myself to humanity freely and without condition. DIPLOMAT stands.

dialogues.speaker: RUSSIAN DIPLOMAT
dialogues.text: (angry) . _ You attacked Russian Military.

dialogues.speaker: SUPERMAN
dialogues.text: They were firing on innocent Civilians. Russian civilians.

dialogues.speaker: RUSSIAN DIPLOMAT
dialogues.text: (shouts) Lies! That was an act of war.  76. The conference ERUPTS. The President holds up a FILE.

dialogues.speaker: PRESIDENT NELSON
dialogues.text: This file contains a list. In the past year you have been involved in several international incidents. Russia, Great Britain, China. The list goes on and on. You consistently interfere with world affairs with no regard to the consequences or legal ramifications of your actions.

dialogues.speaker: SUPERMAN
dialogues.text: I help where I can. I'm here to save lives. I can't afford to stop and consider what politicians will be inconvenienced by my actions.

dialogues.speaker: PRESIDENT NELSON
dialogues.text: And as noble as your motives may or may not be. You cannot expect us as a species to simply sit back and allow you to dictate the course of our history without our consent. Where is your authority?

dialogues.speaker: SUPERMAN
dialogues.text: Honestly I have none. I am not here to be a dictator. I'm here to serve the people of this planet in any way I can.

dialogues.speaker: PRESIDENT NELSON
dialogues.text: And therein lies the problem. who do you really serve? At the end of the day Kal El you answer to no one but yourself and that is a frightening concept. Stewart, who sits between Silas and Swanwick, leans towar the Professor.

dialogues.speaker: STEWART
dialogues.text: I gotta give it to the lady. She ain't scared of no one. Man or alien. Silas nods. The President holds up a SECOND DOCUMENT.

dialogues.speaker: PRESIDENT NELSON
dialogues.text: I hold in my hand a United Nations Bill. Signed and ratified by every member state that demands you (MORE )

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: PRESIDENT NELSON (cont'd) surrender yourself to it's authority. If you are truly here to serve then serve the people of Earth by abiding by it's laws and institutions.

dialogues.speaker: SUPERMAN
dialogues.text: That is something I cannot do.

dialogues.speaker: PRESIDENT NELSON
dialogues.text: Can't or won't.

dialogues.speaker: SUPERMAN
dialogues.text: I am here to serve all humanity regardless of their allegiance. What you are asking my to do is take orders and eventually take sides.

dialogues.speaker: PRESIDENT NELSON
dialogues.text: Then I do not see how we can allow you to enforce your will on our way of life, regardless of your intentions. You're not leaving us much in the way of options. The BRITISH PRIME MINISTER stands.

dialogues.speaker: BRITISH PRIME MINISTER
dialogues.text: You must agree to the U.N Bill. The Conference ERUPTS with CHEERS of SUPPORT for the BILL

dialogues.speaker: SUPERMAN
dialogues.text: But I will not be a prisoner or a pawn for government interests and that at the end of the day is what the Bill means. It's submission to an authority that I cannot recognize because it prevents me from serving all the people of the world. I will pledge myself to humanity but not to it's leaders. I'm sorry Mrs President. The Conference YELLS and MURMERS. Wayne sits in silence pondering this turn of events. Waller smiles to herself.

dialogues.speaker: SWANWICK
dialogues.text: This is all Waller needs.

dialogues.speaker: STEWART
dialogues.text: What do you mean?  78.

dialogues.speaker: SWANWICK
dialogues.text: Superman has just thumbed his nose at every bureaucrat and politician on the planet. The President will sign off on Cadmus. This is exactly what she wanted. The Conference has gone CRITICAL. Lois shakes her head in DISGUST at the REACTION of the ASSEMBLY.

dialogues.speaker: SUPERMAN
dialogues.text: Please understand. I do this for the good of the world. Not despite it. I'm sorry. He LIFTS off and takes to the sky. The sound of a SONIC B echos through the Park as he leaves.

dialogues.speaker: WALLER
dialogues.text: You will be.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: BIBBO BIBBOWSKI, an UNSHAVED BEAR OF A MAN, tends BAR in DINGY Hob's Bay BAR. There are a FEW CUSTOMERS, MOSTLY DRUNKS. Through the entrance walks Mercy, carrying with her a BRIEFCASE. She walks past the bar towards a BOOTH ina darkened CORNER of the room. Sitting in the Booth is DAVID CANE, 50's, one of the Worl DEADLIEST ASSASSINS.

dialogues.speaker: MERCY
dialogues.text: I would have preferred if you had picked a more discreet location.

dialogues.speaker: CAIN
dialogues.text: Plain sight has always been my favorite form of discretion. (gestures for her to sit down) Have a seat. Mercy sits in the Booth opposite the Assassin. She puts t Briefcase on the table.

dialogues.speaker: MERCY
dialogues.text: So I'm assuming you have agreed to our proposal or why else would I be here Mr. Cain.

dialogues.speaker: CAIN
dialogues.text: Once you've agreed to my price.  79.

dialogues.speaker: MERCY
dialogues.text: It's reasonable. It'll be half now and half on completion. She SLIDES the Briefcase over to him.

dialogues.speaker: CAIN
dialogues.text: And this is?

dialogues.speaker: MERCY
dialogues.text: One of the provisions of the agreement. Cain OPENS the Briefcase. He SMILES at the CONTENTS.

dialogues.speaker: MERCY, (CON'T)
dialogues.text: Consider it a gift. Good faith gesture but the Client insists you use it. If you don't we'll know and the agreement will be void.

dialogues.speaker: CAIN
dialogues.text: Fair enough. Mercy nods and stands.

dialogues.speaker: CAIN, (CON'T)
dialogues.text: It's very public. You sending a message?

dialogues.speaker: MERCY
dialogues.text: In a manner of speaking. She leaves.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Federov sits at a Computer Terminal reading over endless DATA and COMPUTER CODE.

dialogues.speaker: LUTHOR, (0.S)
dialogues.text: Burning the midnight 011? Federov jumps out his seat, STARTLED. Luthor steps out from behind the Ultimate's Incubation Chamber and SMILES.

dialogues.speaker: FEDEROV
dialogues.text: (worried) Luthor! What are you doing here? Luthor presses the control to open the Chamber and looks the sleeping Ultimate.

dialogues.speaker: LUTHOR
dialogues.text: Just checking up on my investment.  80.

dialogues.speaker: FEDEROV
dialogues.text: If anyone finds you in here...

dialogues.speaker: LUTHOR
dialogues.text: They'll forget they saw me or end up being forgotten. There's something I need from you.

dialogues.speaker: FEDEROV
dialogues.text: I can't. Not again. Luthor gets close to the COWERING Scientist.

dialogues.speaker: LUTHOR
dialogues.text: You can and you will. (gestures to the Ultimate) You've already done what I needed you to do. What else can't you do?

dialogues.speaker: FEDEROV
dialogues.text: (pleading) Please. Luthor walks past Federov to the Computer Terminal and casually attaches a FLASHDRIVE to the HARDDRIVE.

dialogues.speaker: LUTHOR
dialogues.text: There was an incident at the research center. An attack. Some of the material was taken.

dialogues.speaker: FEDEROV
dialogues.text: The subjects?

dialogues.speaker: LUTHOR
dialogues.text: It's insignificant. But I want to make sure there are no setbacks on this end. Federov watches the code FLASHING across the Computer screen.

dialogues.speaker: FEDEROV
dialogues.text: That's the Ultimate program data. If Waller finds out.

dialogues.speaker: LUTHOR
dialogues.text: I don't see how she will. (removes the flashdrive and puts it in his pocket) And if she does I'll make sure you'll be back in the shack in Chechnya where I found you. Federov lowers his head as Luthor passes and PATS him on back.  81.

dialogues.speaker: LUTHOR, (CON'T)
dialogues.text: Keep up the good work. It's what you live for. As he walks he receives a CALL on his CELLPHONE.

dialogues.speaker: LUTHOR, (CON'T)
dialogues.text: (into phone) Success?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mercy sits in the back of the Limo on her Cell.

dialogues.speaker: MERCY
dialogues.text: Was there ever any doubt?

dialogues.speaker: LUTHOR, (0.S)
dialogues.text: Not at all. I'll see you at the party. She hangs up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Diana stands POISED. She HOLDS her SHIELD tight against h chest and her SWORD pointed in front of her. Her eyes are CLOSED. Suddenly she EXPLODES into a SPECTACULAR COMBAT ROUTINE. SWINGS her Sword with expert GRACE and FLUIDITY. She is FRIGHTENING and BEAUTIFUL to BEHOLD. Her speed is SUPERNATURAL. SHe is a BLUR of FLESH and STEEL moving in PERFECT SYNC. She finishes and DROPS to one knee her Sword and Shield b her side. She OPENS her eyes. In front of her arranged like an ALTER is her ARMOR (CHESTPIECE which is MOLDED into an EAGLE, SILVER GAUNTLE and a HELMET shaped like the SPARTAN WARRIORS VISOR with RED STAR emblazoned upon its BROW) She RESTS her forehead on the HILT of her Sword and PRAYS her GODDESS. Io enters. 10 Your highness. The arrangements have been made. Diana stands and places her Shield with her Armor.

dialogues.speaker: DIANA
dialogues.text: Good. Let me meet this little King.  82.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It is the GRAND OPENING of Lex Luthor's SKYSCRAPER, THE SPIRE. At 150 STORIES it is the TALLEST STRUCTURE in Metropolis. LIMO'S and SPORTS CARS pull up outside. CELEBRITIES and DIGNITARIES walk the RED CARPET into the Skyscraper.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Spire's BALL ROOM is host to the WORLD'S ELITE. The REVELLERS party and mingle amid the TABLES which are stocked with DELICACIES and DISHES from all over the worl Clark and Lois walk through the PLUSH PARTY.

dialogues.speaker: LOIS
dialogues.text: You look uncomfortable.

dialogues.speaker: CLARK
dialogues.text: It's the suit. It's a little tight around the neck.

dialogues.speaker: LOIS
dialogues.text: Give it here. Lois adjusts his collar.

dialogues.speaker: LOIS, (CON'T)
dialogues.text: Better?

dialogues.speaker: CLARK
dialogues.text: I like my other one better.

dialogues.speaker: LOIS
dialogues.text: Well you can't wear that here. Half the people here are from countries that want you arrested. Clark smiles. Martha appears behind them in a BEAUTIFUL DRESS and with GLASS of CHAMPAGNE.

dialogues.speaker: MARTHA
dialogues.text: (excited) I just saw Bruce Springsteen. He's got more grey hair than me. (she pinches Clark's cheeks) Look at you in a suit.

dialogues.speaker: CLARK
dialogues.text: Are you drunk?  83.

dialogues.speaker: MARTHA
dialogues.text: (shakes the glass) On this stuff. Not hardly. They got any of the good stuff? Louis points to the other side of the room.

dialogues.speaker: LOIS
dialogues.text: I saw a bar over that way. What do you say we prop it up?

dialogues.speaker: CLARK
dialogues.text: Lois! (exasperated) ois!

dialogues.speaker: LOIS
dialogues.text: Babe. I'm at a party thrown by a man I loath. If you think I'm not going to have a few shots you're mistaken.

dialogues.speaker: CLARK
dialogues.text: (relents) Fine. Just don't let Mom get wasted.

dialogues.speaker: MARTHA
dialogues.text: (indignant ) Aw don't yourself. Martha grabs Lois' arm and leads her towards the Bar.

dialogues.speaker: MARTHA
dialogues.text: (to Lois) He brought his suit didn't he.

dialogues.speaker: LOIS
dialogues.text: It's in the car. He wanted to wear it under his clothes. Martha laughs OUT LOUD startling some guests.

dialogues.speaker: PERRY, (0.S)
dialogues.text: (calls) Lois. Lois sees Perry and Jimmy among the Attendees.

dialogues.speaker: LOIS
dialogues.text: (to Martha) I'll catch up. Martha heads to the bar while Lois joins Perry and Jimmy.

dialogues.speaker: PERRY
dialogues.text: I didn't expect you to turn up.  84.

dialogues.speaker: LOIS
dialogues.text: Far be it from me to let old grudges color my professionalism.

dialogues.speaker: PERRY
dialogues.text: (sarcasm) I'll bet. (firmly) Don't make a scene.

dialogues.speaker: LOIS
dialogues.text: Honestly I'm here for the drinks. If you'll excuse me. Lois leaves to join Martha at the bar.

dialogues.speaker: JIMMY
dialogues.text: (to Perry) You think she's telling the truth.

dialogues.speaker: PERRY
dialogues.text: Of course not. Bruce Wayne walks through the room followed by Alfred. A WAITER offers him some champagne. He declines.

dialogues.speaker: ALFRED
dialogues.text: Should I see if they have gingerale Master Bruce.

dialogues.speaker: WAYNE
dialogues.text: Please. Alfred leaves to get the gingerale. Wayne continues to walk through the party until he spies Woman in a STUNNING RED DRESS standing looking out of the window at the CITY LIGHTS. He approaches her.

dialogues.speaker: WAYNE
dialogues.text: I can tell you didn't grow up ina city. Diana turns to face Wayne.

dialogues.speaker: DIANA
dialogues.text: Not like this. How could you tell?

dialogues.speaker: WAYNE
dialogues.text: City people are rarely so taken with the lights. (reaches out his hand) Bruce Wayne. Diana shakes his hand.  85.

dialogues.speaker: DIANA
dialogues.text: Diana.

dialogues.speaker: WAYNE
dialogues.text: A pleasure to meet you.

dialogues.speaker: DIANA
dialogues.text: Likewise Mr Wayne.

dialogues.speaker: WAYNE
dialogues.text: Please Bruce. I can't place your accent.

dialogues.speaker: DIANA
dialogues.text: I come from Themyscira.

dialogues.speaker: WAYNE
dialogues.text: I've heard it's beautiful. I've never been.

dialogues.speaker: DIANA
dialogues.text: My country doesn't interest men like you. We are not Monaco. We have no casinos.

dialogues.speaker: WAYNE
dialogues.text: (jokingly) I could have some built for you.

dialogues.speaker: DIANA
dialogues.text: I'm sure.

dialogues.speaker: WAYNE
dialogues.text: What brings you to Metropolis?

dialogues.speaker: DIANA
dialogues.text: I am looking for someone.

dialogues.speaker: WAYNE
dialogues.text: Lucky someone. Perhaps I can help you find them. The Attendees of the party turn their attention to the Ba Room's entrance. Luthor has arrived dressed in a SLEEK BLACK SUIT with Mer on his arm. He walks to the center of the room and the crowd GATHERS around him.

dialogues.speaker: DIANA
dialogues.text: (polite) I won't be needing your help, thank you. Excuse me Mr. Wayne.

dialogues.speaker: WAYNE
dialogues.text: Bruce.  86. She walks past Wayne towards the crowd. As she does Jimmy SMILES at her.

dialogues.speaker: JIMMY
dialogues.text: (confident ) Hey there. She IGNORES him and walks past him.

dialogues.speaker: JIMMY, (CON'T)
dialogues.text: (rejected) Bye there. Martha, visibly TIPSY, appears and links arms with him.

dialogues.speaker: MARTHA
dialogues.text: I think you're punching a little above your weight. Jimmy nods as she leads him toward the crowd. Luthor TAKES THE FLOOR. He TAPS a SPOON against a WINE GLASS to get everyones attention.

dialogues.speaker: LUTHOR
dialogues.text: Ladies and gentlemen let me thank you for coming. The crowd ERUPTS in APPLAUSE. Clark pushes his way AWKWARDLY past people. He STOPS when he sees Diana. She sees him too and both LO EYES. Recognizing each others HIDDEN POWER.

dialogues.speaker: LUTHOR, (CON'T)
dialogues.text: And I like to welcome you to the Spire. She was started less than a year ago today. I built it to honor the city and the strength of its people. She will stand as a beacon. Shining even brighter than the star that is my home, Metropolis. To light the way for mankind. As a tribute to our potential. An example of the greatness we are capable of achieving. A symbol we can touch. That represents the dream within us all. Of the heights humanity can aspire to and the depths of human sacrifice to be. The people of this city raised the Spire and it is they who I honor here tonight. I believe in humanity. I believe in us. He raises his glass to THUNDEROUS APPLAUSE.  87. Luthor, withMercy, moves through the crowd.

dialogues.speaker: LOIS, (0.S)
dialogues.text: Very inspiring. Luthor turns to see Lois and Martha by the bar. Mercy steps in front of her Boss, DEFENSIVELY.

dialogues.speaker: LUTHOR
dialogues.text: (to Mercy) It's fine. (to Lois) It's a nice surprise to see you here.

dialogues.speaker: LOIS
dialogues.text: Wouldn't miss it. It was quite a speech.

dialogues.speaker: LUTHOR
dialogues.text: Thank you Ms. Lane. You're not the only one who's good with words.

dialogues.speaker: LOIS
dialogues.text: Except I don't write fiction.

dialogues.speaker: LUTHOR
dialogues.text: You write slander.

dialogues.speaker: LOIS
dialogues.text: Perry White maybe bound by some misplaced Hob's Bay code of honor. But I'm not. You may live far above the law but all that means is you have further to fall. Luthor smiles at Lois' VEILED threat.

dialogues.speaker: LUTHOR
dialogues.text: The only thing I'm above Ms. Lane is indulging in fantasy. Enjoy the party. Luthor leaves. Mercy GLOWERS at Lois before following him

dialogues.speaker: MARTHA
dialogues.text: Slimy little punk.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cain, dressed in an OIL BLACK SUIT, opens up the Briefcas Inside the case is the PARTS of a POWERFUL HIGH-TECH SNIP RIFLE. He ASSEMBLES the WEAPON.  88.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Diana approaches Clark.

dialogues.speaker: DIANA
dialogues.text: You're not like these people.

dialogues.speaker: CLARK
dialogues.text: (intrigued) Neither are you. Who are you?

dialogues.speaker: DIANA
dialogues.text: A warrior. Like you.

dialogues.speaker: CLARK
dialogues.text: I'm not a warrior. Diana begins to circle him.

dialogues.speaker: DIANA
dialogues.text: You have the power of a one. Yet you conceal it But I see you for what you are. You're the one he wants to kill.

dialogues.speaker: CLARK
dialogues.text: who?

dialogues.speaker: DIANA
dialogues.text: Their little King. He hates you. She glances as Luthor.

dialogues.speaker: CLARK
dialogues.text: (confused) Lex Luthor? Lois and Martha walk up behind Clark.

dialogues.speaker: LOIS
dialogues.text: Who's your friend?

dialogues.speaker: CLARK
dialogues.text: (to Diana) I didn't get your name.

dialogues.speaker: DIANA
dialogues.text: Diana.

dialogues.speaker: LOIS
dialogues.text: Hi. Mind if I steal Clark away? Lois GRIPS Clark's forearm and LEADS him away.

dialogues.speaker: MARTHA
dialogues.text: (to Diana) You're sniffing around the wrong rooster stretch. You're a big one (MORE )

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MARTHA (cont'd) but that girl there is pretty scrappy. (genuine) Nice dress. Diana smiles at Martha.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cain takes aim at the Ball Room.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lois has pulled Clark to a corner of the Hall.

dialogues.speaker: LOIS
dialogues.text: (playful) So who was that?

dialogues.speaker: CLARK
dialogues.text: She's different. There's something about her.

dialogues.speaker: LOIS
dialogues.text: And what's that supposed to mean?

dialogues.speaker: CLARK
dialogues.text: It's not like that she's different from everybody.

dialogues.speaker: LOIS
dialogues.text: (surprised) Like you?

dialogues.speaker: CLARK
dialogues.text: No. She's something else. Luthor leans against a table and SWIPES his finger across the screen of his Cellphone.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cain's rifle begins to EMIT a HIGH FREQUENCY SOUND that i INAUDIBLE to HUMAN HEARING.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Clark WINCES in PAIN. His head BEGINS to POUND as he hear RINGING in his EARS.

dialogues.speaker: LOIS
dialogues.text: (concerned) Clark! What's wrong?

dialogues.speaker: CLARK
dialogues.text: (in pain) I don't know! Something!  90. He Looks out of the window and uses his SUPER VISION to s out of the window and across to the HIGHRISE. He sees Cai with his RIFE AIMED.

dialogues.speaker: CLARK
dialogues.text: Take cover!

dialogues.speaker: LOIS
dialogues.text: What's happening? Clark doesn't answer. He RUSHES out of the party BUMPING into guests as he does. Diana is STALKING Luthor through the party. Luthor walks up to Edge who is FLIRTING with TWO MODELS a places is hand on his shoulder.

dialogues.speaker: EDGE
dialogues.text: (grins widely) Lex. Some party man.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cain takes aim. SCOPE VIEW: The CROSS HAIRS are AIMED at the back of Luthor's head.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Luthor looks Edge right in the eyes. Edge is visibly UNCOMFORTABLE.

dialogues.speaker: LUTHOR
dialogues.text: It is easier to forgive an enemy than to forgive a friend. (smiles) William Blake. Edge realizes he has been found out and nods his head sheepishly. Luthor gives him a friendly PAT on the CHEEK and turns hi head slightly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: SCOPE VIEW: Luthor has moved out of the way and now the cross hairs are on Edge. Cain PULLS THE TRIGGER.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Diana steps toward Luthor. Suddenly the window SHATTERS and Cain's BULLET FINDS it's MARK.  g1. Morgan Edge falls to the floor with a SINGLE BULLET HOLE his FOREHEAD. The Guests SCREAM and the party turns to CHAOS. Luthor's BODY GUARDS snatch him up and RUSH him out of th hall. Martha is KNOCKED to the floor by a FLEEING GUEST.

dialogues.speaker: LOUIS
dialogues.text: (shouts) Martha. Wayne RUSHES to her aid and helps her up from the floor.

dialogues.speaker: MARTHA
dialogues.text: (to Wayne) Thanks handsome.

dialogues.speaker: WAYNE
dialogues.text: (to Lois) Get her out of here. Lois and Jimmy escort Martha out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cain is ready to make his escape when BOOM! Superman CRAS through the wall. He SNATCHES the Rifle which is still EMITTING the high pitched noise. He CRUSHES it. Superman SHAKES off the effects of the sound and sets his sights on Cain. Cain takes a step back and pulls TWO HIGH POWERED HANDGUN He FIRES at the Kryptonian but the bullets BOUNCE off his chest. Superman LUNGES forward with his SUPER SPEED and GRABS Ca by the THROAT. A HIDDEN CAMERA is PLACED in the corner of the room. It RECORDS the scene.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Luthor watches the scene on his Cellphone. He SWIPES his finger across the screen and a SCREEN APPEARS with the wo "DETONATE' on it. He PRESSES it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Superman uses his X-RAY VISION to see that EXPLOSIVES are CONCEALED in the WALLS of the room. They BEGINS to GLOW R and BURN.  92. Cain sees this.

dialogues.speaker: CAIN
dialogues.text: (to himself) Son of a bitch. The EXPLOSIVES DETONATE.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Everybody is EVACUATING the Spire through the main entran including Wayne and Alfred when the TOP FLOORS of the Highrise EXPLODE in a BALL OF RED FLAME. Huge chunks of DEBRIS fall from the sky down onto the str and BYSTANDERS. One such CHUNK falls DIRECTLY in the path of an oncoming BUS. The DRIVER swerves as it SMASHES the windscreen and CAREENS toward the evacuating guests.

dialogues.speaker: WAYNE
dialogues.text: (shouts) Everybody move! People RUN and JUMP out of the way of the Bus which CRASH through the entrance to the Spire DESTROYING the GLASS EXTERIOR of the BUILDING before coming to a VIOLENT HALT. Diana stands in front of the Bus HOLDING it in place with her BARE HANDS. The Driver looks at her in SHOCK. Wayne looks around to see if anyone is injured and to his SHOCK and HORROR he sees Alfred laying on the ground. The Butler has a DEEP GASH in his FOREHEAD and his RIGHT ARM TWISTED and BROKEN. Wayne RUSHES to his side. Lois, Martha and Jimmy look up at the SMOKING REMAINS of Highrise and see Superman floating there holding in his hands the CHARRED remains of Cain's black suit. Wayne sees the Kryptonian and his eyes are filled with ANGER.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The STUDIO is SMALL but COSY and filled with KEEPSAKES fr Superman's TRAVELS. Clark sits in the DARK with his head hanging, GUILTY. In his HANDS he holds the CHARRED PIECE of Cain's SUIT. The FRONT DOOR opens and Lois enters, closing the door behind her QUIETLY.  93. She walks around and KNEELS in front of him.

dialogues.speaker: LOIS
dialogues.text: (comforting) Tell me what happened.

dialogues.speaker: CLARK
dialogues.text: (guilty) I failed.

dialogues.speaker: LOIS
dialogues.text: It's not your fault.

dialogues.speaker: CLARK
dialogues.text: (emotional) People were hurt because of me. They're right. I am a threat. Lois CARESSES his face and KISSES him on the forehead.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Alfred lies SEDATED on a HOSPITAL BED. His HEAD WRAPPED i BANDAGES and his ARM in a CAST. Wayne stands by his Butler's side, looking GRIM. He puts his hand on Alfred's forehead for a moment before leaving.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wayne steps out into the Hallway where LESLIE THOMPSON, 60's, HUGS him TIGHT.

dialogues.speaker: WAYNE
dialogues.text: Thanks for coming.

dialogues.speaker: LESLIE
dialogues.text: Will he be okay?

dialogues.speaker: WAYNE
dialogues.text: He will be. They'll keep him in for observation. I'd like for you to take him back to Gotham when he's ready.

dialogues.speaker: GRAYSON
dialogues.text: Of course.

dialogues.speaker: WAYNE
dialogues.text: Thank you.

dialogues.speaker: GRAYSON
dialogues.text: What about you? Wayne WALKS AWAY down the Hallway.  94.

dialogues.speaker: WAYNE
dialogues.text: There's something I have to do.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bruce Wayne thinkers with a DEVICE on a workbench in the SECRET ARMORY beneath the Wayne Enterprises Metropolis Offices. The Armory is a smaller Batcave. Large MONITORS hang. on walls along with various HIGH TECH GADGETS. Different VEHICLES are covered in TARPS. He raises the Device and it is revealed he is wearing a REINFORCED METAL GAUNTLET. He FLEXES the FINGERS and they WHINE electronically.

dialogues.speaker: LUTHOR, (0.S)
dialogues.text: Impressive tech but it won't get the job done by itself. Bruce WHIPS around to see Luthor step out of the shadows, SMILING.

dialogues.speaker: WAYNE
dialogues.text: (surprised) How did you get past my security? Luthor WAVES his Cellphone.

dialogues.speaker: LUTHOR
dialogues.text: (smiles) I used my phone. I'd offer to upgrade your system but I doubt you'd get it. Old dogs, new tricks. Wayne turns his back on Luthor and returns to fine tuning his Gauntlet.

dialogues.speaker: WAYNE
dialogues.text: You can take your new tricks and leave Luthor.

dialogues.speaker: LUTHOR
dialogues.text: You'll need some of my new tricks if you plan to go up against it. That is what your planning to do? Luthor sees a METAL COWL on the workbench.

dialogues.speaker: LUTHOR, (CON'T)
dialogues.text: Or is Batman going to do the honors?

dialogues.speaker: WAYNE
dialogues.text: (unperturbed) So you know who I am. You aren't the first.  95.

dialogues.speaker: LUTHOR
dialogues.text: I don't care what you do with your nights.

dialogues.speaker: WAYNE
dialogues.text: Then why are you here?

dialogues.speaker: LUTHOR
dialogues.text: I'm sorry about your Butler.

dialogues.speaker: WAYNE
dialogues.text: He's recovering.

dialogues.speaker: LUTHOR
dialogues.text: I'm glad to hear. (beat ) You can't take it down by yourself.

dialogues.speaker: WAYNE
dialogues.text: We'll see.

dialogues.speaker: LUTHOR
dialogues.text: You spoke of an alliance Bruce. I'm here to help.

dialogues.speaker: WAYNE
dialogues.text: There's nothing you have that I need. Luthor reaches into his jacket and removes a SMALL METAL CYLINDER. Housed in the middle of the CYLINDER is a GLASS VIAL containing a LUMINESCENT GREEN SUBSTANCE.

dialogues.speaker: LUTHOR
dialogues.text: I have this. Wayne removes the Gauntlet and lays it down on the Workbe and turns towards Luthor. He eyes the Cylinder SUSPICIOUS

dialogues.speaker: WAYNE
dialogues.text: And that is?

dialogues.speaker: LUTHOR
dialogues.text: A new trick. (he hands the Cylinder to Wayne) It's synthesized from a substance we uncovered from the Indian Ocean after they tried to terraform our planet. We believe its radioactive to them. Wayne eyes the GREEN LIQUID.

dialogues.speaker: WAYNE
dialogues.text: I'm not an assassin.  96.

dialogues.speaker: LUTHOR
dialogues.text: It won't kill it. But it'll know what it's like to bleed. Wayne looks Luthor in the eyes.

dialogues.speaker: WAYNE
dialogues.text: (suspicious) What's your stake in this Luthor? Luthor SWIPES his finger ACROSS the SCREEN of his Cellpho THE MONITOR SCREENS on the Armory's walls FLICKERS to lif Displayed on the Screens is a series of PHOTOS of A PRETT YOUNG REDHEAD at VARIOUS STAGES of her life... COLLEGE

dialogues.speaker: LUTHOR
dialogues.text: Her name was Lena. She was a PR executive for one of LexCorp's smaller divisions. The building she worked in was vaporized when the Alien's attacked. (beat ) They never found her body. (swipes his fingers across the phone and the monitors goes black) My sister was just one of thousands Wayne. How many more? Luthor turns to leave. Wayne contemplates the Cylinder in his hand.

dialogues.speaker: WAYNE
dialogues.text: You know where to find him? Luthor keeps walking.

dialogues.speaker: LUTHOR
dialogues.text: It, Wayne. It's never to far from Lane. Luthor leaves. Wayne places the Cylinder on the workbench and picks up t metal Cowl and carries it toward TWO HUGE DOORS which SLI OPEN revealing a DARK ROOM. He enters.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The STAFF, including Lois and Jimmy, are all gathered aro a TV SCREEN watching a NEWS REPORT.  97.

dialogues.speaker: NEWSCASTER
dialogues.text: Metropolis was shocked last night by the assassination of Morgan Edge. A PHOTO of EDGE appears on the SCREEN. A Picture

dialogues.speaker: NEWSCASTER, (CON'T)
dialogues.text: Edge who was head of Public Relations at LexCorp and an original member of Luthor's team was executed at last nights grand opening of Luthor's Spire. of David Cain appears.

dialogues.speaker: NEWSCASTER, (CON'T)
dialogues.text: The assassin has been identified as David Cain. The report cuts to Video of a JAPANESE WOMAN who is being escorted by ARMED F.B.I AGENTS.

dialogues.speaker: NEWSCASTER, (CON'T)
dialogues.text: This morning F.B.I Agents arrested Kord Industries C.E.0 Kimiyo Hoshi after seizing bank accounts that allegedly show transactions between her and the assassin. Kord Industries has been a rival to LexCorp for several years. Superman's SYMBOL appears.

dialogues.speaker: NEWSCASTER, (CON'T)
dialogues.text: Cain was himself killed by the being known as Superman. Neither LexCorp nor Kord Industries could be reached for comment. Lois turns away from the Broadcast.

dialogues.speaker: LOIS
dialogues.text: (irritated) Superman didn't kill anybody. He was set up.

dialogues.speaker: JIMMY
dialogues.text: The whole world is saying he did. And with injuries and property damage they're going after him big time.

dialogues.speaker: LOIS
dialogues.text: This has Luthor's stink all over it. I'm going home. Take care Olsen.  98.

dialogues.speaker: JIMMY
dialogues.text: G'night Lois. She leaves.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lois enters her apartment and closes the door. She CLICKS the light switch. Nothing happens.

dialogues.speaker: LOIS
dialogues.text: (irritated) Dammit. She uses the LIGHT of her Cellphone screen and walks towa the Kitchen and opens a drawer to find a light bulb.

dialogues.speaker: BATMAN, (0.S)
dialogues.text: Where is he? Lois almost JUMPS OUT OF HER SKIN and turns to see Batman SILHOUETTE against the living room window.

dialogues.speaker: LOIS
dialogues.text: Oh my god. She runs for the door. A Batarang STICKS into the wall in front of her and she STOPS in her tracks. When she turns around Batman is standing right in front o her.

dialogues.speaker: BATMAN
dialogues.text: I'm not going to hurt you.

dialogues.speaker: LOIS
dialogues.text: What do you want from me?

dialogues.speaker: BATMAN
dialogues.text: I want you to give him a message. 85th and Shuster. Tonight. He PULLS the Batarang from the wall and leaves.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Clark's Cellphone VIBRATES on his Coffee table. He snatches it up.

dialogues.speaker: CLARK
dialogues.text: Lois?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Superman lands on the street between the ROWS and ROWS of UNDER CONSTRUCTION BUILDINGS.  99.

dialogues.speaker: KAL
dialogues.text: Superman turns to see Batman down the street behind him. Batman wears a SUIT of PROTECTIVE ARMOR. His GLOVES are HYDRAULIC GAUNTLETS. His COWL is now a REINFORCED METAL HELMET and his eyes are hidden behind SNOW WHITE LENSES. CAPE flows in the wind. He steps forward, his HEAVY BOOTS THUDDING against the street. Superman LEVITATES off the ground and slowly DRIFTS towar Batman. He comes to a halt and the Man of Steel and The Dark Knig STARE EACH OTHER DOWN.

dialogues.speaker: SUPERMAN
dialogues.text: (angry) ; If you have something to say, say it now... (scans Batman with his X-Ray vision) Bruce Wayne.

dialogues.speaker: BATMAN
dialogues.text: (undaunted) You're dangerous Kal.

dialogues.speaker: SUPERMAN
dialogues.text: They say the same about you.

dialogues.speaker: BATMAN
dialogues.text: All you are is power and no control.

dialogues.speaker: SUPERMAN
dialogues.text: And all you are is a scared man in a mask who threatens women.

dialogues.speaker: SUPERMAN
dialogues.text: (smiles slightly) I don't threaten Kal. You have two choices. Agree to the U.N proposal.

dialogues.speaker: SUPERMAN
dialogues.text: And be a prisoner?

dialogues.speaker: BATMAN
dialogues.text: It's better than the alternative.

dialogues.speaker: SUPERMAN
dialogues.text: Which is?

dialogues.speaker: BATMAN
dialogues.text: Your threat ends permanently  100. Superman stares into the Batman's COLD WHITE EYES.

dialogues.speaker: SUPERMAN
dialogues.text: (firmly) Go near Lois Lane again and I promise you you'll regret it. We're done here. Superman turns to leave. Batman GRABS his shoulder.

dialogues.speaker: SUPERMAN, (CON'T)
dialogues.text: (angry) Let go.

dialogues.speaker: BATMAN
dialogues.text: Can't you see? The lives that you're putting in danger? The lives you've already cost?

dialogues.speaker: SUPERMAN
dialogues.text: I said... (eyes glow) Let... GO! He PUSHES Batman's CHEST PLATE and sends the Vigilante reeling backwards and SLAMMING ROUGHLY into a PARKED CEME TRUCK. Superman looks back at Batman, REGRETFUL of what he's jus done.

dialogues.speaker: BATMAN
dialogues.text: (whispers) You brought this on yourself. He reaches behind his CAPE and produces a SILVER GRENADE. He PULLS the PIN and THROWS it. Superman CATCHES the grenade. BOOM! -- It EXPLODES engulfing him in a THICK GREEN SMOKE Superman COUGHS and SPLUTTERS as the SMOKE FILLS HIS LUNG The SMOKE CLEARS and Superman hears the sound of HYDRAULI JOINTS MOVING and then -- BAM! Batman LANDS a CRUSHING RIGHT CROSS directly across Superman's JAW. STAGGERING him. Superman STUMBLES back trying to STEADY himself. Batman follows up with a CRUSHING ONE TWO COMBO sending Superman further back and then down to ONE KNEE. BLOOD TRICKLES down his CHIN. Batman stands above him.  101. Through Superman's eyes: his vision is BLURRED.

dialogues.speaker: SUPERMAN
dialogues.text: (confused) What have you done to me?

dialogues.speaker: BATMAN
dialogues.text: (smiles) Evened the odds. Superman GRITS his TEETH and LIFTS OFF. He SPEAR TACKLES Batman. He flies forward SMASHING his opponent BACKWARDS through WALL of an UNDER CONSTRUCTION building and SLAMS him to t ground. Batman GRIPS Superman by the THROAT and SQUEEZES trying t CUT OFF the Man of Steel's AIR SUPPLY. He DIGS his BOOTS into the CONCRETE floor and HEADBUTTS Superman. Superman PUNCHES Batman in the CHEST and sends him throug WINDOW and out into the street. Batman ROLLS OVER and as he does he PULLS another GRENADE and THROWS it back through the window. It EXPLODES bringing the ENTIRE BUILDING down onto Superm The Man of Steel throws the debris off. Batman ATTACKS again. He throws a PUNCH which Superman CATCHES in his fist and retaliates with a COUNTER PUNCH which Batman CATCHES. Both Men engage in a TEST of STRENGTH.

dialogues.speaker: BATMAN, (CON'T)
dialogues.text: You're feeling it now. What it's like to be human.

dialogues.speaker: SUPERMAN
dialogues.text: (struggling) Why are you doing this?

dialogues.speaker: BATMAN, (CON'T)
dialogues.text: Because no one else can. Superman, even in his DIMINISHED state gains the UPPER HA

dialogues.speaker: SUPERMAN
dialogues.text: And if you beat me... SPARKS fly from Batman's ARM JOINT as his Armor begins to FALTER.  102.

dialogues.speaker: SUPERMAN, (CON'T)
dialogues.text: . who do they send after you? Superman's EYES GLOW RED and he EMITS a BLAST of HEAT VIS which IMPACTS Batman's Chest Plate causing it to melt. Batman releases his GRIP and is sent HURTLING backwards i another CONSTRUCTION SITE and DISAPPEARS from view. Superman tries to SHAKE the FOG from his VISION. He wipes the BLOOD from his CHIN. With some EFFORT he TAKES OFF. A HIGH TENSILE CORD wraps around Superman's ANKLE and he STALLS in MID AIR. Beneath him Batman, BLOOD DRIPPING from his own mouth, SM rising from his Armor has CONNECTED the other end of the WIRE to a BULLDOZER which is being DRAGGED SLOWLY ACROSS ground. The Dark Knight pulls a POWERFUL TASER from his BELT and ELECTROCUTES the WIRE. Superman YELLS out in PAIN as the WAVES of ELECTRICITY COURSE through his body. Batman TOSSES the Taser aside, and COILS the WIRE around FOREARM and pulls the WEAKENED Man of Steel back to Earth He SLAMS VIOLENTLY into the ground. Before he can stand Batman is already upon him and WRAPS Wire around Superman's NECK and PULLS the Cord TIGHT.

dialogues.speaker: BATMAN
dialogues.text: (smiles) There is no one. Superman GASPS for AIR then JUDO THROWS Batman over his shoulder SLAMMING him into the GROUND and STOMPING on his CHEST and PINNING him. He flies off taking Batman, whose arm is still WRAPPED in the wire, with him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Superman flies high above the RUINED sections of Metropol CARRYING Batman with him. Batman SKIMS across the roof of whats left of a SKYSCRAPE He DIGS his FEET into the roof TEARING up CONCRETE as he' DRAGGED towards the EDGE. He stops at the edge and WITH A HIS STRENGTH pulls the Cord stopping Superman.  103. His suits joints WHINE as he SWINGS Superman down onto th roof. Superman STANDS and moves out of the way just in time to AVOID a KICK from Batman. Superman PUNCHES Batman in the CHEST sending him SKIDDING BACKWARDS toward the EDGE of the roof.

dialogues.speaker: SUPERMAN
dialogues.text: (weak) That was two ribs. (coughs) Don't make me do this. Batman SPITS blood and then WIPES his mouth before THROWI a Batarang at Superman. The Man of Steel catches the device which STARTS to BEEP then EXPLODES. Batman CHARGES and TACKLES Superman CLEAR OFF the roof. Both Men SMASH through and the wall of an adjacent DEMOLISHED BUILDING and CRASHES down through FLOOR after FLOOR. Batman FIRES a GRAPPLING HOOK which CATCHES as Superman FALLS until he IMPACTS on the ground floor. He lies there, his breathing LABOURED and looks up throug the HOLES in the FLOORS above him. He STRUGGLES to his feet and STAGGERS out through the CRUMBING LOBBY of what USED to be an OFFICE BUILDING. He STUMBLES and FALLS to his knees and finds himself face face with a HUMAN SKULL. He RECOILS in HORROR.

dialogues.speaker: BATMAN, (0.S)
dialogues.text: (solemnly) This is what happens when power goes unchecked Kal. Batman is standing behind him.

dialogues.speaker: BATMAN, (CON'T)
dialogues.text: You're a nuclear bomb and this is the fallout. Superman takes a LABORED BREATH and raises his FISTS. Batman attacks with a LIGHTNING FAST COMBINATION of PUNCH before terminating with a SIDE KICK which sends Superman backwards through a CRUMBLING WALL. Superman CRASHES out into the STREET.  104. He gets to his feet. He's coughing HARDER now. Batman walks slowly out of the Ruined Office Building. Hi Armor's damaged joints SPARKING. He throws a POWERFUL HAYMAKER but Superman is FASTER and BLOCKS the ATTACK and FIGHTS BACK. He lands a POWERFUL BLOW to Batman's GUT denting his Armo The Dark Knight SPITS out a GOB of BLOOD. Superman attacks again but Batman BLOCKS, PARRIES and COUNTERS. Superman is still STRONGER and FASTER but Batman's EXPERT FIGHTING ABILITIES nullifies Superman's attack. He STRIKES the Man of Steel in the THROAT. Superman falls one knee.

dialogues.speaker: BATMAN, (CON'T)
dialogues.text: I won't kill you... (He strikes Superman in the chest) But I want you to remember Kal in all the years to come... (catches Superman across the jaw) In all your most private moments (Kicks his knee and elbows him under the jaw) That you're not a god... Superman is BREATHING HEAVILY, TOTALLY SPENT.

dialogues.speaker: BATMAN, (CON'T)
dialogues.text: That for all your power, for all your strength... He GRABS Superman by the THROAT and leans in CLOSE. He RELEASES his grip on Superman's throat and DROPS him t the ground.

dialogues.speaker: BATMAN, (CON'T)
dialogues.text: I'm the one who beat you. Superman lies, BEATEN.

dialogues.speaker: BATMAN, (CON'T)
dialogues.text: All this... (gestures to the ruins around them) Is because someone like you didn't know control.  105. Batman turns his back on the FALLEN KRYPTONIAN and walks away.

dialogues.speaker: BATMAN, (CON'T)
dialogues.text: I won't let it happen again. He STOPS when he hears MOVEMENT and turns around. Superman has GOTTEN BACK TO HIS FEET and is STANDING DEFIANTLY. With his FINAL OUNCES of STRENGTH he LAUNCHES at Batman SPEAR TACKLING him back through a CHUNK OF WALL that is JUTTING from the ground and into a BUILDING. Superman holds Batman pressed AGAINST the wall and THROWS WEAK PUNCHES into Batman's RIBS.

dialogues.speaker: SUPERMAN
dialogues.text: (yelling) I tried to save them! I TRIED! Batman HEADBUTTS Superman and sends him to the ground. The Dark Knight is SEEING RED now and GRABS Superman by h SYMBOL of HOPE. He begins to RAIN DOWN PUNCHES much the s as he did with ZSASZ.

dialogues.speaker: BATMAN
dialogues.text: (in a frenzy)

dialogues.speaker: YOU FAILED
dialogues.text: Superman is TOTALLY DONE now and can no longer even DEFEN himself. He starts to go limp.

dialogues.speaker: SUPERMAN
dialogues.text: (whispers) I'm... Sorry...

dialogues.speaker: BATMAN
dialogues.text: You f... (whispers) . failed. Batman STOPS, his breath is in SHORT GASPS, and looks dow on the BEATEN and BLOODIED Superman.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Batman is cradling the dead body of JASON TODD dressed in the 'ROBIN' Armor.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Batman let's go of Superman, HORRIFIED by his ACTIONS, an SLUMPS against the wall. He sits down across from Superma Batman REMOVES his DENTED METAL COWL revealing his face which is BRUISED and SWOLLEN. Both Men are SILENT for a moment.

dialogues.speaker: WAYNE
dialogues.text: You held back. You could have killed me couldn't you? Superman doesn't answer just sits up against the wall acr from Wayne.

dialogues.speaker: WAYNE, (CON'T)
dialogues.text: Why didn't you?

dialogues.speaker: SUPERMAN
dialogues.text: I figured I could reason with you Bruce.

dialogues.speaker: WAYNE
dialogues.text: You weren't talking to Bruce Wayne. (picks up his Cowl and ponders it) You can't reason with anger and regret. He TOSSES the Cowl ASIDE. Superman looks around at the DESOLATE surroundings, MOURNFULLY.

dialogues.speaker: SUPERMAN
dialogues.text: I didn't want this. I wanted to save them. All of them. I thought I could. I never knew I could fail so badly. Wayne is silent for a moment contemplating the BEATEN Kryptonian in front of him.

dialogues.speaker: WAYNE
dialogues.text: You never do until it happens and when it does it breaks you. (beat ) His name was Jason Todd. Superman looks into Wayne's PAIN FILLED EYES.

dialogues.speaker: WAYNE, (CON'T)
dialogues.text: He was like you, (beat ) ...Dangerous. I thought I could help him, train him, make him (MORE )

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: WAYNE(CON'T) (cont'd) better. Instead I got him killed. (voice cracks) He was like my son. He was my son and I failed him.

dialogues.speaker: SUPERMAN
dialogues.text: What do you do with it? With the guilt.

dialogues.speaker: WAYNE
dialogues.text: I lost myself to it. I forgot who I was. I didn't want to stop my enemies anymore all I wanted to do was hurt them.

dialogues.speaker: SUPERMAN
dialogues.text: All I want to do is save them. Both Men sit in silence finally UNDERSTANDING one another Superman, still in PAIN, gets to his feet.

dialogues.speaker: SUPERMAN
dialogues.text: I'm not your enemy Bruce. He reaches out his hand to Wayne. Wayne TAKES Superman's hand and gets to his feet. Superman and Batman stand HANDS TOGETHER. Superman suddenly DOUBLES over in PAIN. Batman CATCHES hi before he falls.

dialogues.speaker: SUPERMAN, (CON'T)
dialogues.text: Silas Stone. Get me to Silas Stone.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Silas Stone WAKES and sees Batman standing above him. Bef he can SCREAM Batman COVERS his mouth with his hand.

dialogues.speaker: BATMAN
dialogues.text: (whispers) Don't scream.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Batman leads Silas down the stairs and through his LIVING ROOM towards the kitchen. Inside he clicks on the light. He GASPS when he sees a SICK and SEMI-CONSCIOUS Superman.

dialogues.speaker: SILAS
dialogues.text: (shocked) Oh my God!  108.

dialogues.speaker: BATMAN
dialogues.text: He needs your help.

dialogues.speaker: SILAS
dialogues.text: What happened?

dialogues.speaker: BATMAN
dialogues.text: He's been poisoned. Silas RUSHES to Superman's side and looks into his EYES which have taken on an EERIE GREEN COLOR.

dialogues.speaker: SILAS
dialogues.text: Poisoned? Who did this?

dialogues.speaker: BATMAN
dialogues.text: (matter of fact) I did.

dialogues.speaker: SILAS
dialogues.text: We need to get him to S.T.A.R Labs. There's nothing I can do for him here. Suddenly Victor STORMS into the kitchen WIELDING a BASEBA BAT.

dialogues.speaker: VICTOR
dialogues.text: (shouts) Dad! Get back! He SWINGS WILDLY at Batman who GRACEFULLY DODGES the ATTA Superman STIRS and Victor SWINGS at him. Superman simply CATCHES the bat..

dialogues.speaker: SILAS
dialogues.text: (shouts) Victor stop! Batman GRIPS Victor's forearm TIGHT.

dialogues.speaker: BATMAN
dialogues.text: Listen to the man son. Victor's eyes meet Batman's GAZE and he CALMS. Batman tak the shattered bat from him.

dialogues.speaker: SILAS
dialogues.text: They're friends.

dialogues.speaker: VICTOR
dialogues.text: (shocked) Batman? Batman nods.

dialogues.speaker: VICTOR
dialogues.text: You're real?  109. Silas tries to lift Superman. He STRUGGLES.

dialogues.speaker: SILAS
dialogues.text: Victor help get him to the car. Victor helps Batman get Superman to his feet and help him walk out of the house.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Superman is UNCONSCIOUS and lies on a TABLE while his bod is SCANNED by Silas who watches intently at the DATA on h COMPUTER SCREEN. Batman stands at his side, watching. Victor leans against the wall. He feels totally OUT OF PLACE.

dialogues.speaker: BATMAN
dialogues.text: How is he?

dialogues.speaker: SILAS
dialogues.text: He's lucky. I've managed to isolate the compound in his blood stream. He's severely weakened and he'll need time to recover but he'll live.

dialogues.speaker: BATMAN
dialogues.text: Good. Silas turns around in his seat.

dialogues.speaker: SILAS
dialogues.text: You did this to him?

dialogues.speaker: BATMAN
dialogues.text: Yes. I thought he was a threat. I was wrong.

dialogues.speaker: SILAS
dialogues.text: This compound is unlike anything I've seen. The effect it has on Kryptonian physiology. How did you get come by it? You don't strike me as a scientist.

dialogues.speaker: BATMAN
dialogues.text: It was given to me.

dialogues.speaker: SILAS
dialogues.text: By who?

dialogues.speaker: BATMAN
dialogues.text: A manipulative narcissist.

dialogues.speaker: SILAS
dialogues.text: Lex Luthor.  110.

dialogues.speaker: BATMAN
dialogues.text: (impressed) You'd make a good detective.

dialogues.speaker: SILAS
dialogues.text: I've just seen the evidence and although I can't prove anything Lex Luthor has been the money behind several projects that from what I've seen all have one purpose.

dialogues.speaker: BATMAN
dialogues.text: To kill the Superman.

dialogues.speaker: SILAS
dialogues.text: What are you going to do?

dialogues.speaker: BATMAN
dialogues.text: Expose him.

dialogues.speaker: SILAS
dialogues.text: Easier said than done. Lex Luthor buries all evidence. There's never been anything to connect him to the things he's done.

dialogues.speaker: BATMAN
dialogues.text: I'll dig. I'll find something. I used to be a detective. Once upon a time. He turns to leave and walks past Victor.

dialogues.speaker: BATMAN, (CON'T)
dialogues.text: (to Victor) That's some swing. I think you picked the wrong sport. Victor smiles.

dialogues.speaker: SILAS
dialogues.text: What do you want me to tell him when he wakes up? Batman STOPS.

dialogues.speaker: BATMAN
dialogues.text: Tell him I'm sorry. He leaves.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's EARLY morning and the Sun is RISING above the Metropolis skyline in the distance. Bruce Wayne's Limo is parked on the side of a lonely DIRT ROAD.  111. A WHITE LIMO pulls up on the ADJACENT side. Mercy steps o of the driver's side and walks around to the rear door an opens it. Luthor steps out. Wayne, still sporting BRUISES, steps out of his Limo and both Men STARE EACH OTHER DOWN for a moment from across their respective sides.

dialogues.speaker: LUTHOR
dialogues.text: You look better than I expected.

dialogues.speaker: WAYNE
dialogues.text: I don't appreciate being manipulated.

dialogues.speaker: LUTHOR
dialogues.text: Then you shouldn't have made it so easy. Who would have thought tragedy would motivate you so. I needed to test a weapon and the opportunity presented itself. You don't use a sword without knowing its sharp.

dialogues.speaker: WAYNE
dialogues.text: I know you were behind Edge's murder.

dialogues.speaker: LUTHOR
dialogues.text: (scratches his chin dismissively) So you know my dirty little secret and I know yours. You know what that is?

dialogues.speaker: WAYNE
dialogues.text: Stalemate.

dialogues.speaker: LUTHOR
dialogues.text: More accurately I win.

dialogues.speaker: WAYNE
dialogues.text: I'm not about to let you walk away from this.

dialogues.speaker: LUTHOR
dialogues.text: There's nothing you can use against me. You can't connect me to anything. So don't waste your breath on empty threats. But I know everything about you Wayne. Grayson, Gordon, what really happened to Jason Todd. At the mention of Jason Wayne CLENCHES his fists.

dialogues.speaker: WAYNE
dialogues.text: You can't threaten me Luthor.  112.

dialogues.speaker: LUTHOR
dialogues.text: I'm not threatening you Wayne. I'm threatening every single person you care about. And there's nothing you can do about it. Luthor nods to Mercy. Who opens the door for him.

dialogues.speaker: LUTHOR, (CON'T)
dialogues.text: Go back to roughing up psychos in Gotham. (smiles) And hope no more kids die in the process. Wayne's is ANGRY but keeps his COMPOSURE.

dialogues.speaker: WAYNE
dialogues.text: You tried to stab a god in the back Luthor. Luthor leans into the Limo.

dialogues.speaker: WAYNE, (CON'T)
dialogues.text: (smiles) And now he knows who's hand held the knife. Luthor pauses and looks over his shoulder slightly.

dialogues.speaker: LUTHOR
dialogues.text: We are done here. Luthor sits into the Limo and Mercy closes the door. Wayne watches as the Limo as it drives away.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Superman opens his eyes to see Victor sitting beside him.

dialogues.speaker: SUPERMAN
dialogues.text: (confused) Where am I?

dialogues.speaker: VICTOR
dialogues.text: S.T.A.R Labs. My father and Batman brought you here. You were sick.

dialogues.speaker: SUPERMAN
dialogues.text: How long was I out?

dialogues.speaker: VICTOR
dialogues.text: About 15 hours. Superman sits up slowly.

dialogues.speaker: SUPERMAN
dialogues.text: And Silas?  113.

dialogues.speaker: VICTOR
dialogues.text: He'll be back. Superman touches his SWOLLEN jaw.

dialogues.speaker: SUPERMAN
dialogues.text: I must look as bad as I feel.

dialogues.speaker: VICTOR
dialogues.text: Then you must feel pretty damn bad. Did Batman do that to you? Superman nods.

dialogues.speaker: VICTOR, (CON'T)
dialogues.text: How? He's just a man? Silas enters the room.

dialogues.speaker: SUPERMAN
dialogues.text: He cheated.

dialogues.speaker: SILAS
dialogues.text: How do you feel?

dialogues.speaker: SUPERMAN
dialogues.text: What did he do do me?

dialogues.speaker: SILAS
dialogues.text: You were poisoned by a radioactive substance. Kryptonian in origin.

dialogues.speaker: SUPERMAN
dialogues.text: (surprised) Kryptonian? How?

dialogues.speaker: SILAS
dialogues.text: Lex Luthor. He must have synthesized from a by product from the World Engine's terraforming. Superman stands.

dialogues.speaker: SUPERMAN
dialogues.text: I have to go. People will be worried. He walks towards the exit past Silas.

dialogues.speaker: SILAS
dialogues.text: Matters are much worse. Superman stops.

dialogues.speaker: SILAS, (CON'T)
dialogues.text: (regretful) I should have told you.  114.

dialogues.speaker: SUPERMAN
dialogues.text: Told me what?

dialogues.speaker: SILAS
