dialogues.text: There is a Project called Cadmus. They've found a way to replicate Kryptonian DNA using your people's technology.

dialogues.speaker: SUPERMAN
dialogues.text: (realization) The Genesis Chamber.

dialogues.speaker: SILAS
dialogues.text: They've created a weapon with one purpose. To kill you. And Lex Luthor is behind it all. What happened last night was only a test of your weaknesses. Superman CONTEMPLATES the information for a moment.

dialogues.speaker: SUPERMAN
dialogues.text: Thank you Silas. For everything. Superman continues toward the exit.

dialogues.speaker: VICTOR
dialogues.text: He said he was sorry. Superman stops by the exit and LEANS against it with one hand to stay STEADY.

dialogues.speaker: VICTOR, (CON'T)
dialogues.text: The Batman, he said he was sorry. Superman responds to Victor's words with a nod and leaves

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Luthor exits the Elevator and walks over to his Bar where removes and Energy drink for the fridge and cracks it ope He SMILES.

dialogues.speaker: LUTHOR
dialogues.text: I was wondering when you'd pay me a visit. He turns. FLOATING outside the Window is Superman. ARMS FOLDED. He STARES a HOLE THROUGH Luthor. Luthor SWIPES his thumb across his Cellphone's screen and the Window's SLIDE OPEN. He walks out on the balcony to NEMESIS.  115.

dialogues.speaker: SUPERMAN
dialogues.text: Your assassin failed. Luthor TILTS his head and observes Superman's WOUNDS.

dialogues.speaker: LUTHOR
dialogues.text: (smiles) I wouldn't say failed.

dialogues.speaker: SUPERMAN
dialogues.text: This has to end now Luthor.

dialogues.speaker: LUTHOR
dialogues.text: It ends when you do. You brought a war to my city and it's only right I bring it right back to you.

dialogues.speaker: SUPERMAN
dialogues.text: You're a criminal and a murderer.

dialogues.speaker: LUTHOR
dialogues.text: So are you.

dialogues.speaker: SUPERMAN
dialogues.text: I'll expose you. I'll show the world what you really are.

dialogues.speaker: LUTHOR
dialogues.text: All the while hiding what you really are. You and Wayne are so alike. So righteous and so hypocritical. Both threatening to reveal the truth about me but when it.comes down to it he hides behind a mask and you behind a symbol. It's pathetic. And you think you can come here and intimidate me? You arrogant alien bastard. Superman doesn't respond.

dialogues.speaker: LUTHOR, (CON'T)
dialogues.text: And it's that arrogance that makes you weak. You float there with all your power but do you even know how you do it? You were given these gifts, you didn't do anything to earn them and you use them like a child would use a gun.

dialogues.speaker: SUPERMAN
dialogues.text: Bold words for a man who prefers someone else's finger on the trigger.

dialogues.speaker: LUTHOR
dialogues.text: Well we all can't shoot fire from our eyes. (MORE)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: LUTHOR (cont'd) (takes a gulp from his drink) I think you should float away now. Luthor turns his back on Superman.

dialogues.speaker: SUPERMAN
dialogues.text: You won't win.

dialogues.speaker: LUTHOR
dialogues.text: I already have. The problem with you is that you are so assured that nothing I can do can hurt you. Yet you surround yourself with people I can hurt. (he turns to face Superman) Like Lois Lane. Superman's face betrays his EMOTION. The THREAT has made ANGRY.

dialogues.speaker: LUTHOR, (CON'T)
dialogues.text: Maybe I'll treat myself and buy the Planet. Change things around a little. By the time I'm done Lois Lane will by licking my boot heels just to cover a little league game. Superman LUNGES and GRABS Luthor by the THROAT.

dialogues.speaker: SUPERMAN
dialogues.text: (angry) . If you go near Lois Lane I'll...

dialogues.speaker: LUTHOR
dialogues.text: (strained) You'll what kill me? Go ahead. Show the world what you really are. Even then I'll still win. Superman eases his GRIP on Luthor's throat. He TOSSES him back into the Penthouse Superman regains his COMPOSURE.

dialogues.speaker: SUPERMAN
dialogues.text: (composed) You say I hide behind a symbol. What really makes you angry is that you can't see what lies behind the symbol. But I can see you for what you really are. Luthor HOLDS his throat and COUGHS.  117.

dialogues.speaker: SUPERMAN, (CON'T)
dialogues.text: Behind the money and the suits, behind LexCorp there is nothing but a terrified little street thug. Frightened of what he can't understand.

dialogues.speaker: LUTHOR
dialogues.text: (angry) I understand you perfectly.

dialogues.speaker: SUPERMAN
dialogues.text: I'm not talking about me. I'm talking about a soul. In the end I'm more human than you'll ever be. Superman turns and FLIES away. Lex is LIVID. He stands and RUNS out onto the balcony.

dialogues.speaker: LUTHOR
dialogues.text: (shouting, angry) You've made your last mistake! This City is mine! It's people are mine! I'm going to show them all you're nothing! I'm going to take everything from you! (whispers) Even your soul.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lois is asleep on her bed. She awakes to see Superman at window. She JUMPS out of bed and HUGS him.

dialogues.speaker: LOIS
dialogues.text: Where have you been? (sees his wounds, shocked) Oh my god what happened?

dialogues.speaker: SUPERMAN
dialogues.text: It's okay. I'm fine.

dialogues.speaker: LOIS
dialogues.text: Your face?

dialogues.speaker: SUPERMAN
dialogues.text: Will heal. I just need to rest.

dialogues.speaker: LOIS
dialogues.text: And the Batman?

dialogues.speaker: SUPERMAN
dialogues.text: He'll be just as sore as I am in the morning. (MORE )

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: SUPERMAN (cont'd) (falls on her bed) I just need to rest. Lois sits beside him and places her hand on his forehead he falls ASLEEP.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Luthor SITS on his DESK in the DARK. IMAGES of Superman FLICKER ACROSS the Monitors. ANGRY, he JUMPS up and SHATTERS ONE of the MONITORS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Luthor SPLASHES water on his face and STARES at his REFLECTION in the MIRROR with a MANIACAL look in his eyes He GRABS and ELECTRIC RAZOR and begins to SHAVE his HEAD.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mercy steps out of the ELEVATOR and is SHOCKED to see Lut SHAVEN HEADED and SHIRTLESS, revealing his TATTOOED BODY, sitting on his Desk.

dialogues.speaker: MERCY
dialogues.text: (concerned) What's wrong?

dialogues.speaker: LUTHOR
dialogues.text: (calm) Nothing. I just don't feel like hiding who I am anymore.

dialogues.speaker: MERCY
dialogues.text: (unsure) Are you ok?

dialogues.speaker: LUTHOR
dialogues.text: I'm better than Ok Mercy. (beat) At dawn I kill a god.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Several BLACK CARS pull up outside the INCONSPICUOUS BARN Out of the Cars emerge SEVERAL GOVERNMENT and MILITARY OFFICIALS including Swanwick, Stone, Stewart and General Candy.

dialogues.speaker: CANDY
dialogues.text: (to Swanwick) Good to see you.  119.

dialogues.speaker: SWANWICK
dialogues.text: You too Sir.

dialogues.speaker: CANDY
dialogues.text: (gestures to Silas and Stewart) You must have pulled a few strings to get those two here?

dialogues.speaker: SWANWICK
dialogues.text: Their my advisors.

dialogues.speaker: CANDY
dialogues.text: Works for me. (Candy looks around) Where's Waller?

dialogues.speaker: WALLER, (0.S)
dialogues.text: Here General. Waller stands by the BARN DOORS.

dialogues.speaker: WALLER, (CON'T)
dialogues.text: Glad you could make it General Candy. If you would be so good as to follow me.

dialogues.speaker: CANDY
dialogues.text: (to others) You heard the lady. They all follow Waller into the Barn. Where they find tha the floor is SOLID CONCRETE.

dialogues.speaker: WALLER
dialogues.text: Welcome to Cadmus. The FLOOR begins to DESCEND and they find themselves goin down into the Cadmus facility.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The OFFICIALS follow Waller into a AUDITORIUM where FEDER waits. They stand behind a LARGE THICK GLASS WINDOW which separa them from a LARGE ROOM with CONCRETE WALLS and two LARGE REINFORCED STEEL DOORS. Silas reaches out his hand to Federov.

dialogues.speaker: SILAS
dialogues.text: Dr. Federov. I've read your work. It's quite an honor to finally meet you. Federov AWKWARDLY shakes Silas' hand.  120.

dialogues.speaker: FEDEROV
dialogues.text: Thank you.

dialogues.speaker: WALLER
dialogues.text: You'll have to excuse Dr. Federov what he lacks in social skills he makes up for in genius.

dialogues.speaker: SILAS
dialogues.text: (to Waller) I'm sure. I'm very interested in seeing the results of your project Waller.

dialogues.speaker: CANDY
dialogues.text: As am I.

dialogues.speaker: WALLER
dialogues.text: I promise you General. What you see here today will make Superman look like a one of your grunts. (to Stewart) No offense.

dialogues.speaker: STEWART
dialogues.text: None taken. Federov nods to Waller.

dialogues.speaker: WALLER
dialogues.text: If you'll take your seats we shall begin. The Officials take their seats as Federov OPERATES his Tablet. The Steel Doors OPEN and a LARGE STEEL CAPSULE is WHEELED into the room by TwO TECHNICIANS.

dialogues.speaker: FEDEROV
dialogues.text: Allow me to present the Ultimate. Federov ACTIVATES the Capsule. It OPENS to reveal THE ULTIMATE. The Creature's BODY is CONCEALED in a GREEN CONTAINMENT S with TWO RED EYES.

dialogues.speaker: CANDY
dialogues.text: What is it?

dialogues.speaker: FEDEROV
dialogues.text: It's a being of my design. Cloned from cells derived from an alien specimen.  121.

dialogues.speaker: SILAS
dialogues.text: Kryptonian DNA is complex. How did you bridge the gaps between sequences.

dialogues.speaker: FEDEROV
dialogues.text: We used DNA from compatible specimens.

dialogues.speaker: SILAS
dialogues.text: Human?

dialogues.speaker: FEDEROV
dialogues.text: In a manner of speaking. Silas is intrigued by Federov's answer.

dialogues.speaker: CANDY
dialogues.text: What's with the suit?

dialogues.speaker: FEDEROV
dialogues.text: Kryptonian abilities is dependent upon absorption of solar energy. We've enhanced that.

dialogues.speaker: CANDY
dialogues.text: Which means?

dialogues.speaker: FEDEROV
dialogues.text: We've made it stronger. The suit regulates how much the Ultimate absorbs.

dialogues.speaker: CANDY
dialogues.text: Stronger's good.

dialogues.speaker: WALLER
dialogues.text: (to Federov) I'm sure General Candy would appreciate a demonstration. Federov nods. He operates the Controls and the Ultimate STEPS out of th Capsule. It STOMPS over to the Concrete wall.

dialogues.speaker: STEWART
dialogues.text: You're controlling it?

dialogues.speaker: FEDEROV
dialogues.text: The Ultimate has been pre programmed to follow our commands.

dialogues.speaker: WALLER
dialogues.text: Totally obedient. Completely under our control.  122.

dialogues.speaker: CANDY
dialogues.text: (amused) Already better than the Superman.

dialogues.speaker: WALLER
dialogues.text: You haven't seen anything yet. (to Federov) Sasha. Federov commands the Ultimate. The Creature PUNCHES through the CONCRETE WALL.

dialogues.speaker: WALLER
dialogues.text: That's ten feet of solid concrete General. Candy is IMPRESSED.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Luthor watches the Ultimate's demonstration on his Comput Monitors. Mercy stands behind him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Ultimate REMOVES its FIST from the wall and stands in front of the WINDOW.

dialogues.speaker: CANDY
dialogues.text: (to Waller) Well Amanda. I'm impressed.

dialogues.speaker: WALLER
dialogues.text: Thank you general.

dialogues.speaker: CANDY
dialogues.text: When can we expect to have this guy out on the front lines?

dialogues.speaker: WALLER
dialogues.text: There are still a few more tests but I'm confident once President Nelson gives the go ahead we can have the Ultimate in the field within the year.

dialogues.speaker: CANDY
dialogues.text: You have my vote. I'll support the Project. Several of the other Officials CONCUR with General Candy.

dialogues.speaker: CANDY, (CON'T)
dialogues.text: Big Blue won't be a problem anymore.  123.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Luthor fingers GLIDE over the KEYBOARD as he uploads NEW PROGRAMMING into the Ultimate's BRAIN. His hand hovers over the Keyboard. He EXECUTES the PROGRAM.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Ultimate STANDS straight.

dialogues.speaker: FLASH
dialogues.text: IMAGES FLASH through the Ultimate's mind -- SUPERMAN'S SYMBOL -- METROPOLIS -- FEDEROV.

dialogues.speaker: FLASH
dialogues.text: The Ultimate walks toward the WINDOW.

dialogues.speaker: ULTIMATE
dialogues.text: growls)

dialogues.speaker: STEWART
dialogues.text: (concerned) What's it doing? Waller and Federov turn. Federov tries to control the Creature but to NO AVAIL.

dialogues.speaker: WALLER
dialogues.text: (to Federov) What's wrong?

dialogues.speaker: FEDEROV
dialogues.text: (frantic) It's not responding to commands. The Ultimate PUNCHES through the GLASS and GRABS Federov the HEAD and PULLS him back through the WINDOW. Waller and the others back away from the Window and towar the EXIT. The Ultimate TOSSES the LIMP DEAD BODY of Federov ASIDE a proceeds to SMASH his way through the Window.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Officials FLEE the AUDITORIUM. The Ultimate SMASHES through the WALL and ROARS. Stewart DRAGS Silas down the CORRIDOR as the Ultimate SMASHES through another wall.  124. Waller watches as the Creature SMASHES it's way through t Complex.

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUOUS
dialogues.text: The Rural outskirts are QUIET and SERENE. A FAINT SOUND o POUNDING can be heard. The sound gets LOUDER and LOUDER until the ground begins SHAKE and CRACK. BOOM! The Ultimate has PUNCHED it's way to the surface. I Containment Suit is TORN and SHREDDED. It's GREY skin and BONE LIKE PROTRUSIONS are visible. It looks to the SUN which is BLAZING overhead. It CELLS start to ABSORB the SOLAR ENERGY and it ROARS. It covers its EARS in an attempt to BLOCK the SOUNDS whic are AMPLIFIED by its ENHANCED KRYPTONIAN SENSES. It FOCUSES on the SOURCE of it's PAIN... METROPOLIS

dialogues.speaker: MMMRRR... TRRRRP... LSSSS
dialogues.text: A BIRD flies past and the Ultimate GRABS it from the AIR CRUSHES it. It ROARS again and JUMPS HIGH through the air in the direction of the City.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Clark's eyes SNAP OPEN. He can HEAR the Monster COMING. He gets out of bed and walks to the window. Lois walks into the room and sees him standing.

dialogues.speaker: LOIS
dialogues.text: (concerned) You should be resting.

dialogues.speaker: CLARK
dialogues.text: (worried) Call the Planet. We need to get everybody to safety.

dialogues.speaker: LOUIS
dialogues.text: Clark?

dialogues.speaker: CLARK
dialogues.text: (grave) Somethings coming.  125.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Ultimate LANDS and SMASHES through a HOUSE before JUMPING again.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: PEDESTRIANS stop and listen as they hear the sound of HEA IMPACT getting LOUDER and LOUDER. Boom... Boom... Boom... BOOM!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lois looks out of the window. She can hear IMPACT. Superman, FULLY SUITED, stands behind her. A ROAR echos throughout the City.

dialogues.speaker: LOIS
dialogues.text: (shocked) What is that! Clark steps toward the window.

dialogues.speaker: LOIS, (CON'T)
dialogues.text: You can't go out there Clark you're still sick.

dialogues.speaker: SUPERMAN
dialogues.text: I have to.

dialogues.speaker: LOIS
dialogues.text: No. You're too weak. He puts his hands on her shoulders.

dialogues.speaker: SUPERMAN
dialogues.text: Somethings out there and I have to stop it. Lois caresses the still NOT FULLY HEALED wounds on his fa

dialogues.speaker: LOIS
dialogues.text: (softly) You were bleeding... I... I can't... He kisses her. A gust of wind BLOWS Lois' hair back as he FLIES out of t window.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: METROPOLIS UNIVERSITY is FACING OFF against GOTHAM UNIVERSITY.  126. Victor stands with his TEAM waiting for the PLAY. The BALL is TOSSES to Victor who THROWS it ACROSS the PIT where it is CAUGHT by his TEAMMATE who RUNS for the TOUCH DOWN. The Stadium ERUPTS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Ultimate LANDS on the GROUND forming a CRATER right outside the CITY. He JUMPS AGAIN directly INTO to the City.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Both Teams have STOPPED playing. Like the Spectators they are more concerned with the soun of IMPACT getting ever CLOSER. People start to PANIC. Then BOOM! Parts of the PITCH are THROWN through the air the Ultimate SLAMS DOWN into the MIDDLE of the Stadium. The Spectators SCREAM and PANIC and RUSH toward the EXITS The Beast ROARS as it CHARGES the BLEACHERS and BEGINS to TEAR the Stadium APART. The Ultimate PUNCHES people aside ATTACKS indiscriminatel Victor watches as the Creature PURSUES a FAMILY (MOTHER, FATHER and INFANT SON). The Son TRIPS and FALLS as the Ultimate closes in on her. Victor sees this and RUSHES to his aid and with AMAZING SPEED snatches him up from the ground just as the Creatur SMASHES his FISTS into the ground. He gives the Child to his Parents.

dialogues.speaker: VICTOR
dialogues.text: (to Parents) Run! Just as he utters the words the Ultimate PUNCHES him ASID His body is THROWN through the air and SMASHES AGAINST th stands then onto the ground. He GASPS for air. He has suffered TERRIBLE INJURIES, his BODY is BROKEN. The Ultimate stands over him and is about to strike a KILLING BLOW when Superman TACKLES the Monster and PUSHES away from Victor.  127. Victor watches as both Superman and the Ultimate SMASH through the STADIUM WALLS and out into the street. He SCREAMS in pain as his TEAMMATES come to his aid.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The DUST settles and the Ultimate stands and sees a TRUCK which has come to a HALT in the middle of the street. The SOUND of the ENGINE is like a JACKHAMMER to the Creature. The Creature with speed equal to Superman RUSHES the Truc Before the Creature hits it Superman PULLS the DRIVER fre just it time. The Ultimate SMASHES it REPEATEDLY, completely PULVERIZIN it. Superman puts the Driver down and he runs to safety. The Ultimate sees the Man of Steel and focuses on the HOP symbol on his chest.

dialogues.speaker: FLASH
dialogues.text: The IMAGES Luthor uploaded FLASH through the Ultimate's MIND.

dialogues.speaker: ULTIMATE
dialogues.text: (growls)

dialogues.speaker: SSSSSSPPPPP... RRRRRR... MMMMNNN
dialogues.text: The Ultimate ROARS as it RECOGNIZES it's ENEMY.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Luthor watches the SATELLITE FEED of the Monster's RAMPAG on his Monitors, GRINNING. The Ultimate ROARS in ANGER as it recognizes it's ENEMY.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Superman and the Ultimate CHARGE each other. They COLLIDE and the SHOCKWAVE shatters windows for an ENTIRE CITY BLO Superman is PROPELLED BACKWARDS through the air and into street TEARING up the concrete before he comes to a halt. Before he can even come to his senses the Ultimate POUNCE on him and starts BEATING him down into the ground. Each BLOW shaking the ground like an EARTHQUAKE.  128. Superman catches the Ultimate's arms by the WRISTS and fl upward STRUGGLING with the Creature which CLAWS and KICKS him as they HURTLE through the air.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Diana watches Superman and the Ultimate CAREEN through th air from her WINDOW She looks toward her ARMOR ALTER.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Superman aims toward Centennial Park and they both CRASH down into the PARK'S LAKE. There is a momentary calm before Superman ERUPTS from the water and CAREENS through the air and SMASHES into a SKYSCRAPER before falling to the streets below. He SLAMS into the ground and the street CRUMBLES beneath him. The Ultimate EMERGES from the Lake and STOMPS his way tow the POPULATED CITY BLOCKS.

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUOUS
dialogues.text: Lois EXITS her APARTMENT building and out into the street where PEOPLE are running in PANIC. She pulls out her Cellphone and makes a call.

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUOUS
dialogues.text: The Office is in CHAOS. Everybody is RUNNING back and for Jimmy makes his way through the INSANITY.

dialogues.speaker: JIMMY
dialogues.text: What the hell is going on? An OFFICE WORKER dashes past.

dialogues.speaker: OFFICE WORKER
dialogues.text: (frantic) It's another attack!

dialogues.speaker: PLAZA
dialogues.text: Perry's phone RINGS and he SNATCHES it up. It's Lois.

dialogues.speaker: PERRY
dialogues.text: Lane? Are you seeing this?  129.

dialogues.speaker: LOIS
dialogues.text: Perry. You need to evacuate now!

dialogues.speaker: PERRY, (0.S)
dialogues.text: (over phone) What's happening?

dialogues.speaker: LOIS
dialogues.text: I don't know. But it's bad.

dialogues.speaker: PERRY, (0.S)
dialogues.text: (over phone) Where are you?

dialogues.speaker: LOIS
dialogues.text: Outside my building.

dialogues.speaker: PERRY, (0.S)
dialogues.text: (over phone) Stay there. I'll send someone for you.

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUOUS
dialogues.text: Perry SWINGS his Office door open.

dialogues.speaker: PERRY, (0.S)
dialogues.text: (shouts) Olsen!

dialogues.speaker: JIMMY
dialogues.text: Here Chief.

dialogues.speaker: PERRY
dialogues.text: I have a job for you.

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUOUS
dialogues.text: Jimmy drives his Car at BREAKNECK SPEED out of the Carpar and SPEEDS towards Downtown Metropolis.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Superman CRAWLS from the CRATER. He's BLEEDING from his mouth. He wipes the BLOOD away. With his SUPER HEARING he HEARS the FRIGHTENED voices of Metropolis Citizens.

dialogues.speaker: VOICES, (0.S)
dialogues.text: (frightened, screaming) Oh my God!... What is that thing! Run!... Not again!  130. The Ultimate's ROARS echo through the City. Superman stands and takes to the air.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: FOUR MILITARY HELICOPTERS fly toward the City.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stewart is SUITED up and WIELDS a MACHINE GUN. He speaks a SQUAD of MARINES.

dialogues.speaker: STEWART
dialogues.text: This thing is big and bad and was made to go toe to toe with Superman. We have armor units en route. We stay behind the big guns and help civilians if can. A YOUNG MARINE raises his hand.

dialogues.speaker: YOUNG MARINE
dialogues.text: (scared) If this thing can take on the Superman. What can we do?

dialogues.speaker: STEWART
dialogues.text: You keep shooting until the thing drops son.

dialogues.speaker: PILOT
dialogues.text: (shouts) 3 minutes! The Marines LOCK and LOAD.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Ultimate is DESTROYING everything it can see. People SCREAM as they flee the Creature's RAMPAGE. A FAMILY CAR (MOTHER, FATHER, DAUGHTER) comes to a SCREECHING HALT. The Monster PICKS UP the Car and THROWS it toward a building. The Family SCREAM. Superman appears and CATCHES the vehicle before it can COLLIDE with the building. He puts it down safely.

dialogues.speaker: SUPERMAN
dialogues.text: Get your family out of here! The Father SLAMS his foot on the ACCELERATOR and the car TEARS off.  131. The Ultimate sees Superman and CHARGES him. They renew th BATTLE.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jimmy's Car pulls up beside Lois and he opens the passeng door.

dialogues.speaker: JIMMY
dialogues.text: Get in. Lois jumps in and shuts the door.

dialogues.speaker: LOIS
dialogues.text: I need you to take me... Jimmy cuts her off.

dialogues.speaker: JIMMY
dialogues.text: Downtown. I figured. Lois is taken aback.

dialogues.speaker: LOIS
dialogues.text: Good boy. Now lets go. Jimmy hits the gas and they drive towards Downtown which PLUMES of SMOKE rising from it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Superman and the Ultimate are LOCKED in COMBAT. Superman is giving his all. Hitting the Creature as HARD he can. But the Ultimate simply SHRUGS off the STRIKES an RETALIATES. It's blows HURTING Superman MORE and MORE. BYSTANDERS hide in STORES and APARTMENT BUILDINGS. Some h behind CARS and Peek out of ALLEYS. A M.C.P.D Patrol Car pulls up nearby and Harper and Gardn hop out with their GUNS in hand.

dialogues.speaker: GARDNER
dialogues.text: (shocked) Holy shit!

dialogues.speaker: HARPER
dialogues.text: Ok Kid. The Blue guy's got this. Lets get these people to safety. The Ultimate KICKS Superman in the GUT sending him FLYING towards the Patrol Car. Harper PUSHES Gardner out of the way. The Kryptonian SMASHES into it destroying it.  132. Harper and Gardner watch as the Ultimate RUNS past and SP TACKLES the Man of Steel.

dialogues.speaker: GARDNER
dialogues.text: (matter of fact) I don't think there's anywhere that's safe Jim. Harper stands and PULLS Gardner to his feet. They both begin to USHER the Bystanders away from the BATTLE.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jimmy HITS the BRAKES as they arrive at the scene of DESTRUCTION. Jimmy sees Superman and the Ultimate TRADING BLOWS.

dialogues.speaker: JIMMY
dialogues.text: (shocked) What the hell is that thing? Louis jumps out of the car. Jimmy grabs his Camera from t back seat and follows her. Overhead NEWS STATION HELICOPTERS hover and FILM the scen

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Superman is SLAMMED to the ground. He SWINGS around and lands a devastating RIGHT CROSS on the Ultimate's JAW. The Monster STAGGERS backwards then STEADIES itself and H Superman back REPEATEDLY. With each BLOW Superman is FORCED further back.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bruce Watches the news footage of Superman's battle with Ultimate. It is clear Superman is LOSING. The sound of a CANE hitting the floor DRAWS his attention away from the images on screen. Behind him stands Alfred, leaning on a CANE. He's WEAK bu RECOVERING. He is looking at the footage, CONCERNED. Bruce turns back to the report. His expression one of DETERMINATION.  133.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Martha is watching the scene on TV, TERRIFIED for her Son

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stewart and his Troops march through the destruction and close in on the SUPER POWERED COMBATANTS. Stewart gestures his Squad to HOLD their position. He uses his RADIO to contact S.T.A.R Labs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Hamilton Room has been turned into a makeshift WAR RO Silas, looking GRAVE, is standing among the other SCIENTI watching the scene on a HUGE SCREEN. Swanwick enters the room answers Stewart.

dialogues.speaker: SILAS
dialogues.text: (to Swanwick) We have a direct line to the Pentagon. Stewart is leading an assault.

dialogues.speaker: SWANWICK
dialogues.text: Patch me through

dialogues.speaker: STEWART, (0.S)
dialogues.text: General.

dialogues.speaker: SWANWICK
dialogues.text: Talk to me soldier.

dialogues.speaker: STEWART, (0.S)
dialogues.text: We have feet on the ground. Superman and Waller's pet are throwing down.

dialogues.speaker: SWANWICK
dialogues.text: And?

dialogues.speaker: STEWART, (0.S)
dialogues.text: (grave) Waller made good on her promise.

dialogues.speaker: SWANWICK
dialogues.text: Hold your position. Artillery is en route. Silas gets a CALL on his Cell. He answers. His face TWIST into a look of pure HORROR and he hangs up and RUSHES fro the room.  134.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Superman has the Ultimate in a FULL NELSON. He tries to WRESTLE the Creature to the ground. The Monster GRABS Superman's arms and with his SUPERIOR STRENGTH he pulls himself free of the Man of Steel's GRIP then he grabs the Kryptonian and PILE DRIVES him into the CONCRETE. The Creature ROARS in TRIUMPH. BOOM! An ARTILLERY SHELL EXPLODES against the Monster's back. Several TANKS have arrived and are FIRING on the Ultimate Stewart and his Troops OPEN FIRE. The BARRAGE of FIRE POWER is RELENTLESS. SMOKE and FIRE obscure the Creatures shape. The Tank's and the Soldiers DEPLETE their AMMO and CEASE FIRE. There is an EERIE CALM as the DUST settles. Stewart LOWERS his Weapon and SQUINTS as a SHAPE emerges from the SMOKE. The Ultimate is COMPLETELY UNHARMED. Only the UPPER SECTI of it's Containment Suit has been TORN AWAY revealing it' MUSCULAR GREY FRAME which is COVERED in SHARP SHARDS of BONE.

dialogues.speaker: STEWART
dialogues.text: (worried) We're going to need a bigger gun. The Ultimate ROARS and ATTACKS the Tanks RIPPING them to SHREDS. The Marines DIVE to COVER as the Monster SWINGS a TANK by it's CANNON through a building sending GLASS and CONCRETE flying. Superman RAISES up from the ground. He's WEAK and BLEEDIN He charges the Ultimate and THROWS PUNCH after PUNCH. His STRIKES appear FUTILE against the Monster who FIGHTS back

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mercy watches the CHAOS play out.

dialogues.speaker: MERCY
dialogues.text: (concerned) Are you sure this is going to work?  135.

dialogues.speaker: LUTHOR
dialogues.text: Of course. It kills Superman. We kill it. The world knows who it's true hero is. (smiles) It's only a matter of time.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stewart DUCKS into a DEMOLISHED STORE FRONT where he find Gardner and Harper are also taking cover. The Cop's and Soldier STARE at each other for a moment.

dialogues.speaker: STEWART
dialogues.text: You need to radio ahead and have your guys evacuate as many people as possible and set up a perimeter for at least five city blocks.

dialogues.speaker: HARPER
dialogues.text: I think pretty much everybody for ten blocks has hightailed it out of here. (looks at Gardner) Well the smart ones anyway.

dialogues.speaker: STEWART
dialogues.text: I should hope so. It's going to get pretty hot down here. Stewart peeks out to see the battle RAGING outside. A RIN hangs from a CHAIN around his neck. The Ring is GREEN and ADORNED with a LANTERN SYMBOL. Gardner sees the Ring.

dialogues.speaker: GARDNER
dialogues.text: Nice ring.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: TwO F-16 FIGHTER JETS are CLOSING in on Metropolis.

dialogues.speaker: F-16 PILOT
dialogues.text: We are coming in hot. Repeat we are coming in hot.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Fighter Jets pass over the scene of DESTRUCTION and F their MISSILES on the Ultimate and Superman. The Missiles EXPLODE. Superman is THROWN through the air the Ultimate ROARS in ANGER. It watches as the Jets come in for another pass.  136. As they near the Creature JUMPS into the air and GRABS on of the Jets by the NOSE and SWINGS it at the other. Both Jets explode in a BALL OF FLAME as the Ultimate SLAMS DOW to the STREET below. Superman is DISTRESSED as he watches the JET WRECKAGE fal from the sky. He GRITS his TEETH and WITH SUPER SPEED attacks the Ultim which GRABS him by the THROAT and SMASHES him into the SI of a building. Superman PUSHES the monster back as he STRUGGLES to free himself from it's GRIP. Nearby a DISTRAUGHT Lois watches as Jimmy FILMS.

dialogues.speaker: JIMMY
dialogues.text: (in awe) It's like Doomsday is here. Superman is being BEATEN down in front of Lois' eyes.

dialogues.speaker: LOIS
dialogues.text: (pleading) Please Clark! Don't do this!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Swanwick is HORRIFIED as he watches the Satellite feed of the Jets DESTRUCTION. Morrow receives a COMMUNICATION from the Pentagon..

dialogues.speaker: MORROW
dialogues.text: (to Swanwick) It's the Pentagon.

dialogues.speaker: SWANWICK
dialogues.text: (to Morrow) On speaker. (to pentagon) This is Swanwick.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A RADAR OPERATOR sits at his MONITOR in the PENTAGONS WAR ROOM.

dialogues.speaker: RADAR OPERATOR
dialogues.text: Sir. We have an Jet closing in fast on Metropolis air space.

dialogues.speaker: SWANWICK
dialogues.text: One of ours?  137.

dialogues.speaker: RADAR OPERATOR, (0.S)
dialogues.text: (over speaker) I don't think so Sir.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Superman DROPS to his knees. The newly christened DOOMSDA KICKS him to the ground. Superman LIES on his back as the Monster BEATS down on hi with BOTH ARMS. Superman SPITS up BLOOD with each BLOW. The Creature RAISES his FISTS to deliver another BLOW. BOOM! -- A MISSILE EXPLODES against it's CHEST. Lois and Jimmy look up to the SKY. FLYING HIGH above the Avenue is a GIANT JET shaped like a BAT... THE BATWING.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Batman, in his DENTED Battle Armor, operates the Aircraft He OPENS FIRE on the Ultimate.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bullets IMPACT on on DOOMSDAY'S hide but do not PENETRATE The Monster ROARS as it's attention is turned away from Superman and towards the Batwing. He passes above the Creature and SKIMS over the rooftops between buildings.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Batman speaks into the Batwing's RADIO.

dialogues.speaker: BATMAN
dialogues.text: I need an overview of the city.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Alfred sits at the computer in the Batcave and watches th Computer Screen which is a SATELLITE VIEW of Metropolis.

dialogues.speaker: ALFRED
dialogues.text: The police and Military have erected a perimeter for ten square around.

dialogues.speaker: BATMAN, (0.S)
dialogues.text: (over radio) Civilians?  138.

dialogues.speaker: ALFRED
dialogues.text: They are evacuating them as we speak.

dialogues.speaker: BATMAN
dialogues.text: (smiles) Good. No need to play nice.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Batwing FLIES between the buildings and makes another pass. He FIRES on all CYLINDERS. MISSILES and BULLETS STRIKE Doomsday REPEATEDLY. Superman CRAWLS from beneath the Monster's feet. The Batwing passes above and Doomsday JUMPS toward it. The Batwing DODGES the ATTACK and FLIES past and the Mons PURSUES the Aircraft. Lois runs toward Superman.

dialogues.speaker: JIMMY
dialogues.text: Wait! Lois! Lois THROWS her arms around Superman.

dialogues.speaker: LOIS
dialogues.text: (concerned) Look what it's done to you! Jimmy follows Lois and gets his VERY FIRST look at Superm And he is SHOCKED.

dialogues.speaker: JIMMY
dialogues.text: (in shock) Clark? Superman nods at Jimmy.

dialogues.speaker: LOIS
dialogues.text: You can barely stand.

dialogues.speaker: JIMMY
dialogues.text: You have to hang back that thing is unstoppable.

dialogues.speaker: LOIS
dialogues.text: He's right. You can't do this on your own. Superman looks out over the DESTRUCTION Doomsday has wrought.  139.

dialogues.speaker: SUPERMAN
dialogues.text: I have to Lois. Innocent people could die. I can't let that happen. (beat) Not again.

dialogues.speaker: LOIS
dialogues.text: (crying) Clark... He puts his hand on her cheek and looks into her TEARFUL eyes.

dialogues.speaker: SUPERMAN
dialogues.text: No matter what happens. I love you. He lets her go and takes to the sky.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Batman maneuvers the Aircraft through the City.

dialogues.speaker: BATMAN
dialogues.text: (to ALfred) What's our status?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Alfred presses keys on the Computer and the Screen ZOOMS on Batman's location.

dialogues.speaker: ALFRED
dialogues.text: You're staying within the safe zone but that thing is gaining fast.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Doomsday is RUNNING across ROOFTOPS jumping at the Batwin attempting to SNATCH it from the air. The Plane is only NARROWLY escaping his CLUTCHES. The Monster ATTACKS again but this time is successful and PUNCHES through the Batwing's RIGHT WING. The Aircraft SPIRALS out of control. Batman EJECTS the Plane and FIRES a GRAPPLING HOOK from h GAUNTLET which EMBEDS itself in the side of a building. H SWINGS toward the streets BELOW. AS he lands his Heavy Bo SHATTER the concrete beneath his feet. A SHADOW falls over him and he looks up. Doomsday is DESCENDING towards him ready to CRUSH him BENEATH It's feet. Superman SMASHES into the Monster and both SMASH into the side of a nearby building.  140. After a moment Superman is THROWN back out of the buildin and down into the street. The Man of Steel looks up to see the Dark Knight standing above him. Batman reaches out his hand. Superman takes it and gets t his feet. Behind them the building CRUMBLES as Doomsday SMASHES his way out. The Creature ROARS and CHARGES when suddenly a GOLDEN LAS is WRAPPED around it's neck and it's PULLED BACKWARDS. Holding the other end of the rope is Wonder Woman. She is dressed in her ARMOR. Her SWORD is strapped to her side and her SHIELD across her back. Light reflects off h SILVER GAUNTLETS. Her dark hair FLOWS from beneath her HELMET and down onto her CHEST PLATE. She GRITS her teeth and DIGS her heels into the ground as she PULLS the Monster backwards. The Lasso GLOWS but has NO EFFECT on the Monster. Doomsday WRAPS the Rope around it's FOREARM and TURNS on it's hips SWINGING Diana through the air. She LOOSENS the Rope from the Creature's throat and SOMERSAULTS through the air landing CROUCHED beside Super and Batman. She WHIPS the Rope around her body until it's LOOPED and attached to her belt. Superman and Batman stare is SHOCK and AWE at Wonder Woma Superman STAGGERS.

dialogues.speaker: BATMAN
dialogues.text: (concerned) Kal?

dialogues.speaker: SUPERMAN
dialogues.text: Don't worry about me. Doomsday STARES at it's ENEMIES and FLEXES its MUSCLES an ROARS. Superman steps forward. Batman activates his HYDRAULIC JOINTS. Wonder Woman UNSHEATHES her Sword and RAISES her shield in front of her. Side by side they stand together... THE TRINITY. The Ultimate ATTACKS.  141. Batman PULLS a GRENADE from his belt and tosses it at the Creature. It EXPLODES in it's face. Superman lands a BRUT ONE TWO COMBINATION on it's JAW as Wonder Woman SLASHES i hide with her Sword. The Monster GRABS Wonder Woman and SMASHES her into the ground. It raises its foot to CRUSH her. Before it can ST DOWN Superman TACKLES it. Doomsday puts Superman in a HEADLOCK and STRIKES his. fac before TOSSING him aside. Batman POUNCES on the Creature's back and JAMS two TASERS into it's EYE SOCKETS. The Creature SWATS him aside like a BUG. Batman SKIDS over the asphalt and into a PARKED CAR. The Monster shakes it's head and regains is VISION. Superman and Wonder Woman SIMULTANEOUSLY land PUNCHES on Creature's face, TOPPLING it. The Amazon brings her Sword down towards Doomsday's neck. catches the Blade. She PULLS it free and he BACKHANDS her CLEAR through a building. Superman ATTACKS again. Landing repeated PUNCHES on Doomsday's SKULL. The Man of Steel's KNUCKLES are TORN and BLOODY. Batman gets to his feet. He's hurt but not bad. Stewart and his Squad, along with Gardner and Harper, approach Batman. WEAPONS RAISED.

dialogues.speaker: STEWART
dialogues.text: (firmly) Stand down! Batman looks at the Soldiers. He DISMISSIVELY shakes his head and marches in the direction of Doomsday and Superma

dialogues.speaker: STEWART, (CON'T)
dialogues.text: Hey Halloween! I'm talking to you! Wonder Woman LANDS beside them. Gardner OPENS FIRE. She DEFLECTS the BULLETS effortlessly with her GAUNTLETS.

dialogues.speaker: WONDER WOMAN
dialogues.text: (firmly) Begone or die here!  142.

dialogues.speaker: STEWART
dialogues.text: Hell lady I just got here. She SWINGS her Sword and DASHES after Batman.

dialogues.speaker: HARPER
dialogues.text: (to Gardner) Will you put that thing away! Gardner SHRUGS a 'SORRY'. Doomsday is LAYING INTO Superman now and the Man of Steel reaching the end. His Suit is RIPPED to SHREDS and SPLATTERED with BLOOD. Yet he still FIGHTS on. Wonder Woman CHARGES it and lays a HAYMAKER across it's j which has MINIMAL effect. Superman BEAR HUGS the Creature. He PINS it ARMS allowing Wonder Woman to UNLEASH a SERIES of PUNISHING STRIKES. Doomsday shrugs them off and JUMPS HIGH INTO THE SKY taki Superman with him. They FLY above the rooftops before CRASHING DOWN. Doomsday is on top of Superman and LIFTS him up by the NE He RUNS Superman through BUILDING after BUILDING before SMASHING him into A TRUCK, FLIPPING IT. Superman STRUGGLES to BREAK FREE of it's GRIP. The Monster GRABS hold of Superman's LEFT FOREARM and SQUEEZES. There is a HORRIFIC SOUND of SNAPPING BONE. Superman SCREAMS. He FIRES his HEAT VISION into the Monster's FACE. In retaliation Doomsday PUNCHES him sending through the a and OUT OF SIGHT. A SILVER GRENADE drops at Doomsday's feet. The Monster turns to see Batman standing behind him holdi a DETONATOR in his fist. He PRESSES it. The Grenade EMITS a SONIC BLAST. The Ultimate ROARS in PAIN as the it's ears RING with the SOUND of a HIGH PITCHED SQUEAL. Stewart and his Squad arrive backed up by a TANK.

dialogues.speaker: BATMAN
dialogues.text: (shouts) Concentrate fire! Drive it back! Stewart's Soldiers look to their leader.  143.

dialogues.speaker: STEWART
dialogues.text: (to Marines) You heard the man. The Soldiers OPEN FIRE on the DISORIENTED Monster. The Tank SHELLS the Creature REPEATEDLY. Doomsday is in EXTREME PAIN. He sees the SOURCE of his AGONY. He STOMPS on the Grenade DESTROYING it. Its SHAKES off the effects and FOCUSES on the Humans.

dialogues.speaker: STEWART
dialogues.text: Aw Hell!

dialogues.speaker: BATMAN
dialogues.text: (shouting) Move! Move! Move! With SUPER SPEED Doomsday PULVERIZES the Tank then FLIPS and ATTACKS the Soldiers. Wonder Woman lands amid the CARNAGE and ENGAGES the Creature. She STRIKES and PARRIES and BLOCKS the Monster's attacks with her SHIELD. He SLAPS her aside and she SLAMS against the DESTROYED Ta She falls to her knees using her Sword to PROP HERSELF UP She SPITS BLOOD. She watches as the Ultimate DECIMATES the Marines and the surrounding area. Batman is DRAGGING a WOUNDED MARINE to safety. Stewart has TAKEN COVER behind the OVER TURNED TRUCK and on the radio FRANTICALLY calling for AID. Gardner and Harper are SHOOTING at the Creature while RETREATING. The Amazon GRITS her teeth, WIPES her chin and DASHES bac into the fray.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Luthor SMILES as he watches his plan unfold.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Behind the Over Turned Truck Stewart is COMFORTING the Yo Marine who lies WOUNDED.  144. Doomsday has BEATEN Wonder Woman to the GROUND. The Amazo Shield is DENTED and BENT. Lois and Jimmy are PEERING out from behind the CORNER of BUILDING. Doomsday BACK HANDS Wonder Woman CLEAR ACROSS the STREET into a wall, KNOCKING HER OUT COLD. Doomsday, The Ultimate, stands TRIUMPHANT and ROARS. MEDIA HELICOPTERS hover above the SCENE of DESTRUCTION.

dialogues.speaker: JIMMY
dialogues.text: (to Lois) Where's Clark? Lois doesn't answer.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Superman lies BEATEN and UNCONSCIOUS in the RUINED LOBBY.

dialogues.speaker: MAN, (0.S)
dialogues.text: Superman? The Man of Steel's eyes FLICKER open. Standing above him is an ELDERLY MAN, 70's, who reaches o his hand to him.

dialogues.speaker: ELDERLY MAN
dialogues.text: Let me help you.

dialogues.speaker: SUPERMAN
dialogues.text: (softly) It's ok. With GREAT EFFORT Superman gets to his feet but STUMBLES FALLS to one KNEE. The Elderly Man HELPS him stand. Superman looks at the FRAIL Man that is HOLDING him up an finds UNDERSTANDING.

dialogues.speaker: SUPERMAN
dialogues.text: (weak) Thank you. The Man of Steel steps out into the STREET and FEELS the SUNS RAYS on his SKIN. He CLENCHES his FISTS and FLIES.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Doomsday ROARS as the Helicopters and is about to ATTACK when a SMALL BLINKING DEVICE attaches to it's SPINE.  145. It EXPLODES. The Ultimate turns to see Batman standing out in the open

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Alfred looks AGHAST at the MAGNIFIED SATELLITE IMAGE of Batman standing ALONE in full VIEW of the Creature.

dialogues.speaker: ALFRED
dialogues.text: (concerned) Master Bruce?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Doomsday FIXES its GAZE on the Batman. Jimmy looks up in the sky.

dialogues.speaker: JIMMY
dialogues.text: (joyful) Lois look! Superman LANDS in front of Batman. HURT, his LEFT ARM hel close to his side. The Monster GROWLS. Superman steps forward. Batman GRABS the Kryptonian's shoulder.

dialogues.speaker: BATMAN
dialogues.text: You can't beat it.

dialogues.speaker: SUPERMAN
dialogues.text: I have to.

dialogues.speaker: BATMAN
dialogues.text: You'll die Kal.

dialogues.speaker: SUPERMAN
dialogues.text: Clark. (he turns and smiles at Batman) My name is Clark. He pulls away from Batman and CHARGES the Monster. They FIGHT. Each Combatant is giving it their all. NO QUARTER is give NO MERCY is shown. Superman FALLS to ONE KNEE. Doomsday brings both FISTS down.  146. Superman GRABS the Monster's WRISTS and with all his strength PUSHES the Ultimate back. Superman JUMPS into the AIR and FLIES at SUPER SONIC SPEE into the SKY and then KICKS Doomsday back to Earth. He HOVERS as the Creature FREE FALLS towards the City bel Lois and Jimmy watch as the Monster COLLIDES with the CONCRETE creating and HUGE CRATER. Superman HOVERS above the City for a moment. He closes his eyes and LISTENS.

dialogues.speaker: VOICES, (0.S)
dialogues.text: Please... What's happening?... What is that?... I love you... Dad!... Help! His eyes OPEN and DESCENDS towards the City, BREAKING the SOUND BARRIER. Doomsday RAISES out of the crater and looks up at the Superman who is BARING down on him. Superman YELLS as he THROWS a FINAL BLOW. The Ultimate THROWS it's own KILLING STRIKE. They COLLIDE with such POWER the IMPACT sends SHOCKWAVES throughout the city SHATTERING windows for BLOCKS. The ground SHAKES and the air FILLS with DUST and DEBRIS. Then SILENCE. The DUST settles and Louis and Jimmy watch as the Ultimat STAGGERS. out of the crater. Lois and Jimmy watch in FEAR as the Creature takes a few STEPS before FALLING to it's KNEES and then to the ground Doomsday is DEAD. Superman's TORN CAPE HANGS on a BROKEN STREET LIGHT. Lois RUNS toward the Crater where she BREAKS DOWN when sh sees Superman CLINGING to LIFE. She RUSHES to his side and WRAPS her arms around him.

dialogues.speaker: LOIS
dialogues.text: (emotional) Clark!

dialogues.speaker: SUPERMAN
dialogues.text: (strained) Is it?... Did I...?  147. Lois CARESSES his BLOODIED and SWOLLEN face.

dialogues.speaker: LOIS
dialogues.text: (starts to cry) You did it. You saved us. You saved us all. He SMILES as he DRIFTS AWAY.

dialogues.speaker: LOIS
dialogues.text: (crying) I love you. Superman DIES in Lois Lane's arms.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Martha is on her knees, CRYING uncontrollably.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wonder Woman STAGGERS toward Batman who stands at the EDG of the crater. Stewart flanked by Gardner and Harper HANG their heads. High above the Helicopters RECORD the TRAGIC SCENE.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Luthor smiles TURNS OFF his Computer Monitors.

dialogues.speaker: LOIS, (V.0)
dialogues.text: I knew Superman. I knew him not as a god but as a man. Martha, crying, stands beside a HOLE that has been DUG in the GARDEN. In her hands she HOLDS a SMALL WOODEN BOX. Lois walks up beside her and puts a STUFFED BEAR in the B and EMBRACES Martha.

dialogues.speaker: LOIS, (V.0)
dialogues.text: A man who strove to protect all of our lives. Martha PLACES the Box in the hole. It is FILLED with Clar CHILDHOOD POSSESSIONS (A Trophy, Family photographs, etc etc).  148. In GRIEF she falls to her knees, SOBBING. Lois SITS besid her and hugs her TIGHT. They Both CRY.

dialogues.speaker: LOIS, (V.0)
dialogues.text: And mourned those he was too late to save. Wayne stands with Alfred beside the GRAVE of JASON TODD. Alfred notices someone APPROACHING. He PATS Wayne on the shoulder, smiles and walks away. Wayne turns to see Grayson who JOINS him beside the Grave

dialogues.speaker: LOIS, (V.0)
dialogues.text: There are those who saw him as an enemy... Waller sits at a desk as she is INTERVIEWED by a COMMITTE in front of the PRESS. She looks GRAVE.

dialogues.speaker: LOTS, (V.0)
dialogues.text: there where others who knew him as a friend. Victor Stone lies on a hospital bed. He is in a COMA and LIFE SUPPORT. Silas sits by his side holding his Son's hand, DEVASTATED

dialogues.speaker: LOIS, (V.0)
dialogues.text: But in the end... The MAYOR OF METROPOLIS stands on a podium in front of a THOUSAND CITIZENS.

dialogues.speaker: LOIS, (V.0)
dialogues.text: he stood for us. He fought for US... Behind him covered in WHITE SHEET is a STATUE.

dialogues.speaker: LOIS, (V.0)
dialogues.text: he died for us. The Mayor gestures the SHEET be REMOVED.

dialogues.speaker: LOIS, (V.0)
dialogues.text: Because he was one of us.  149. The sheet is PULLED AWAY to REVEAL a GIANT STATUE of Superman. Standing TALL and PROUD in the SUN.

dialogues.speaker: LOIS, (V.0)
dialogues.text: He was the World's Finest. The Crowd ERUPTS in CHEERS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Superman's Body is housed in a PROTECTIVE GLASS CASE. It ILLUMINATED by a SINGLE WHITE LIGHT. Stewart stands beside the case looking down on the fallen Kryptonian, MOURNFULLY. The EMERALD RING around his neck begins to GLOW He REMOVES the Ring from his neck and PLACES it on his finger. He CLENCHES his fist and a GREEN ENERGY is EMITTED from t Ring. He AIMS it in front of him. The Energy FORMS into the SHAPE of a MAN, YOUNG but BATTL WEARY. This is KYLE RAYNER, member of the GREEN LANTERN CORPS.

dialogues.speaker: RAYNER
dialogues.text: John.

dialogues.speaker: STEWART
dialogues.text: Kyle.

dialogues.speaker: RAYNER
dialogues.text: What do you have to report?

dialogues.speaker: STEWART
dialogues.text: Kal El is dead. The Emerald Man's face HARDENS.

dialogues.speaker: RAYNER
dialogues.text: That's unfortunate. We needed the Kryptonian.

dialogues.speaker: STEWART
dialogues.text: Am I being called back?

dialogues.speaker: RAYNER
dialogues.text: No. Jordan wants you on Earth. To organize a defense when the time comes. Stewart nods, SOLEMNLY.  150.

dialogues.speaker: RAYNER, (CON'T)
dialogues.text: Thanagar has fallen. We can't hold him back any longer. (turns and walks away) Uxas is coming. Rayner FLICKERS and FADES leaving Stewart alone.

dialogues.speaker: STEWART
dialogues.text: (whispers) Darkseid.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bruce Wayne and Alfred stand beside a HUGE INACTIVE SEARCHLIGHT. In the distance LexCorp Tower can be seen. Wayne hears the SOUND of soft FOOTFALLS behind him. He and ALfred turn to see Diana approach.

dialogues.speaker: WAYNE
dialogues.text: I wasn't sure you'd come. She joins them beside the Searchlight.

dialogues.speaker: DIANA
dialogues.text: I came to honor him. He was a great warrior.

dialogues.speaker: WAYNE
dialogues.text: He wasn't a warrior Diana. He was a hero. In the end he realized what that meant.

dialogues.speaker: DIANA
dialogues.text: And what does it mean?

dialogues.speaker: WAYNE
dialogues.text: Being a hero isn't about the lives you save but what you are willing to sacrifice to save them. Clark knew that in the end. He places his hand on the Searchlight's SWITCH.

dialogues.speaker: DIANA
dialogues.text: What are you doing?

dialogues.speaker: WAYNE
dialogues.text: I won't let his sacrifice be in vain. I'm going to let someone know that he didn't win. He HITS the switch and the Searchlight ACTIVATES.  151.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Luthor sits at his desk in the DARK, alone. Suddenly the room is FILLED with a BRIGHT LIGHT. He stands and walks to the window and out onto the balcon Outside the Searchlight is SHINING on his building. The IMAGE is of SUPERMAN's SYMBOL: HOPE. END CREDITS.
